metadata.modern_ja_note: HaQeiトーンによる日本語訳。禁止語（易経・卦・爻・運勢・占い等）を排除し、寄り添い×温かい言い切りのトーンで翻訳。

judgment.classic: 乾：元亨，利貞。
judgment.modern: Qian (represents) what is great and originating, penetrating, advantageous, correct and firm.
judgment.modern_ja: 今は大きな可能性が開かれている時期です。物事を正しく進めていけば、順調に発展していきます。自分の信念を持って、しっかりと歩んでいくことで道が開けていくでしょう。

tuan.classic: 大哉乾元，萬物資始，乃統天。雲行雨施，品物流形。大明始終，六位時成，時乘六龍以御天。乾道變化，各正性命，保合大和，乃利貞。首出庶物，萬國咸寧。
tuan.modern: Vast is the 'great and originating (power)' indicated by Qian! All things owe to it their beginning: - it contains all the meaning belonging to (the name) heaven. The clouds move and the rain is distributed; the various things appear in their developed forms. (The sages) grandly understand (the connexion between) the end and the beginning, and how (the indications of) the six lines (in the hexagram) are accomplished, (each) in its season. (Accordingly) they mount (the carriage) drawn by those six dragons at the proper times, and drive through the sky. The method of Qian is to change and transform, so that everything obtains its correct nature as appointed (by the mind of Heaven); and (thereafter the conditions of) great harmony are preserved in union. The result is 'what is advantageous, and correct and firm. (The sage) appears aloft, high above all things, and the myriad states all enjoy repose.
tuan.modern_ja: この時期は創造的なエネルギーに満ちています。すべての物事が始まりを迎え、形になろうとしている瞬間です。タイミングを見極めながら動くことで、自然と調和した発展が期待できます。

xiang.classic: 天行健，君子以自強不息。
xiang.modern: Heaven, in its motion, (gives the idea of) strength. The superior man, in accordance with this, nerves himself to ceaseless activity.
xiang.modern_ja: 今は自分を高め続ける時期です。止まらずに努力を続けることで、力強く前に進んでいけます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：潛龍，勿用。
1.modern: In the first (or lowest) NINE, undivided, (we see its subject as) the dragon lying hid (in the deep). It is not the time for active doing.
1.modern_ja: 今はまだ動く時ではありません。力を蓄えて、静かに準備を整える段階です。焦らなくて大丈夫です。

xiang.modern: 'The dragon lies hid in the deep; - it is not the time for active doing:' - (this appears from) the strong and undivided line's being in the lowest place.
xiang.modern_ja: まだ表に出る段階ではありません。今は内側で力をつける時期だと思っていいでしょう。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：見龍在田，利見大人。
2.modern: In the second NINE, undivided, (we see its subject as) the dragon appearing in the field. It will be advantageous to meet with the great man.
2.modern_ja: 徐々に表舞台に出始める時期です。信頼できる人との出会いが、大きな転機になるかもしれません。

xiang.modern: 'The dragon appears in the field:' - the diffusion of virtuous influence has been wide.
xiang.modern_ja: あなたの良さが周囲に認められ始める時です。影響力が広がっていく兆しがあります。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：君子終日乾乾，夕惕若，厲，无咎。
3.modern: In the third NINE, undivided, (we see its subject as) the superior man active and vigilant all the day, and in the evening still careful and apprehensive. (The position is) dangerous, but there will be no mistake.
3.modern_ja: 忙しい時期ですが、油断は禁物です。日中は全力で取り組み、夜は振り返りを忘れずに。緊張感を持ち続けることで、失敗を避けられます。

xiang.modern: 'Active and vigilant all the day:' - (this refers to) the treading of the (proper) path over and over again.
xiang.modern_ja: 何度も基本に立ち返ることが大切な時期です。地道な努力が実を結びます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: In the fourth NINE, undivided, (we see its subject as the dragon looking) as if he were leaping up, but still in the deep. There will be no mistake.
4.modern_ja: 飛躍のチャンスが近づいています。でも、まだ完全に表に出る時ではありません。様子を見ながら、タイミングを計ってもいい時期です。

xiang.modern: 'He seems to be leaping up, but is still in the deep:' - if he advance, there will be no error.
xiang.modern_ja: 前に進んでも問題ありません。ただし、慎重さは忘れずに。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：飛龍在天，利見大人。
5.modern: In the fifth NINE, undivided, (we see its subject as) the dragon on the wing in the sky. It will be advantageous to meet with the great man.
5.modern_ja: 最も力を発揮できる時期です。あなたの能力が存分に活かされ、影響力のある人との出会いもプラスに働きます。自信を持って進んで大丈夫です。

xiang.modern: 'The dragon is on the wing in the sky:' - the great man rouses himself to his work.
xiang.modern_ja: 今こそ行動を起こす時です。あなたの力が最大限に発揮される瞬間です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：亢龍有悔。
6.modern: In the sixth (or topmost) NINE, undivided, (we see its subject as) the dragon exceeding the proper limits. There will be occasion for repentance.
6.modern_ja: 頂点に達した後は、下り坂が始まります。やりすぎには注意が必要な時期です。謙虚さを忘れないことで、後悔を避けられます。

xiang.modern: 'The dragon exceeds the proper limits; - there will be occasion for repentance:' - a state of fulness, that is, should not be indulged in long.
xiang.modern_ja: 満ち足りた状態は長くは続きません。今のうちに次の準備をしておくといいかもしれません。

use_nine.label: 用九
use_nine.modern: (The lines of this hexagram are all strong and undivided, as appears from) the use of the number NINE. If the host of dragons (thus) appearing were to divest themselves of their heads, there would be good fortune.
use_nine.modern_ja: リーダーシップを誇示するのではなく、チーム全体で調和を保つことが吉につながります。

xiang.modern: 'The same NINE (undivided) is used' (in all the places of this hexagram), but the attribute of heaven (thereby denoted) should not (always) take the foremost place.
xiang.modern_ja: 常にトップに立とうとするのではなく、時には控えめでいることも大切です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

appendix.classic: 《文言》曰：「元」者，善之長也；「亨」者，嘉之會也；「利」者，義之和也；「貞」者，事之幹也。君子體仁足以長人，嘉會足以合禮，利物足以和義，貞固足以幹事。君子行此四德者，故曰「乾、元、亨、利、貞」。
appendix.modern: What is called (under Qian) 'the great and originating' is (in man) the first and chief quality of goodness; what is called 'the penetrating' is the assemblage of excellences; what is called 'the advantageous' is the harmony of all that is right; and what is called 'the correct and firm' is the faculty of action. The superior man, embodying benevolence, is fit to preside over men; presenting the assemblage of excellences, he is fit to show in himself the union of all propriety; benefiting (all) creatures, he is fit to exhibit the harmony of all that is right; correct and firm, he is fit to manage (all) affairs. The fact that the superior man practises these four virtues justifies the application to him of the words - 'Qian represents what is great and originating, penetrating, advantageous, correct and firm.'
appendix.modern_ja: この時期に大切な4つの要素があります。始まりの力（善の根本）、通じ合う力（良いものの集まり）、有益であること（正しさの調和）、そして正しく固いこと（行動の基盤）。これらを実践することで、道が開けていきます。

judgment.classic: 坤：元亨，利牝馬之貞。君子有攸往，先迷後得主，利西南得朋，東北喪朋。安貞，吉。
judgment.modern: Kun (represents) what is great and originating, penetrating, advantageous, correct and having the firmness of a mare. When the superior man (here intended) has to make any movement, if he take the initiative, he will go astray; if he follow, he will find his (proper) lord. The advantageousness will be seen in his getting friends in the south-west, and losing friends in the north-east. If he rest in correctness and firmness, there will be good fortune.
judgment.modern_ja: 今は主体的に動くより、状況に合わせて柔軟に対応する時期です。最初は迷うかもしれませんが、やがて正しい方向が見えてきます。穏やかに、でもしっかりと地に足をつけていくことで、良い結果につながります。

tuan.classic: 至哉坤元，萬物資生，乃順承天。坤厚載物，德合无疆。含弘光大，品物咸亨。牝馬地類，行地无疆，柔順利貞。君子攸行，先迷失道，後順得常。西南得朋，乃與類行；東北喪朋，乃終有慶。安貞之吉，應地无疆。
tuan.modern: Complete is the 'great and originating (capacity)' indicated by Kun! All things owe to it their birth; - it receives obediently the influences of Heaven. Kun, in its largeness, supports and contains all things. Its excellent capacity matches the unlimited power (of Qian). Its comprehension is wide, and its brightness great. The various things obtain (by it) their full development. The mare is a creature of earthly kind. Its (power of) moving on the earth is without limit; it is mild and docile, advantageous and firm: - such is the course of the superior man. 'If he take the initiative, he goes astray:' - he misses, that is, his proper course. 'If he follow,' he is docile, and gets into his regular (course). 'In the south-west he will get friends:' - he will be walking with those of his own class. 'In the north-east he will lose friends:' - but in the end there will be ground for congratulation. 'The good fortune arising from resting in firmness' corresponds to the unlimited capacity of the earth.
tuan.modern_ja: すべてを受け入れ、育む力がある時期です。自分からガツガツ動くのではなく、周りの流れに身を任せることで、自然と良い方向に進んでいきます。柔軟さと粘り強さを意識することで、より良い結果が期待できます。

xiang.classic: 地勢坤，君子以厚德載物。
xiang.modern: The (capacity and sustaining) power of the earth is what is denoted by Kun. The superior man, in accordance with this, with his large virtue supports (men and) things.
xiang.modern_ja: 大地のように、すべてを包み込む懐の深さが大切な時期です。器の大きさで周囲を支えていくことで、信頼と安定が生まれます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：履霜，堅冰至。
1.modern: In the first SIX, divided, (we see its subject) treading on hoarfrost. The strong ice will come (by and by).
1.modern_ja: 小さな変化の兆しが見え始めています。今のうちに準備をしておくと、後で困らずに済みます。

xiang.classic: 履霜堅冰，陰始凝也。馴致其道，至堅冰也。
xiang.modern: 'He is treading on hoarfrost; - the strong ice will come (by and by):' - the cold (air) has begun to take form. Allow it to go on quietly according to its nature, and (the hoarfrost) will come to strong ice.
xiang.modern_ja: 変化は少しずつ進んでいきます。今見える小さなサインを見逃さないことが大切です。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：直，方，大，不習无不利。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, (shows the attribute of) being straight, square, and great. (Its operation), without repeated efforts, will be in every respect advantageous.
2.modern_ja: 素直で誠実な姿勢が、自然と良い結果を生みます。無理に頑張らなくても、うまくいく時期です。

xiang.classic: 六二之動，直以方也。不習无不利，地道光也。
xiang.modern: The movement indicated by the second six, (divided),is 'from the straight (line) to the square.' '(Its operation), without repeated effort, in every way advantageous,' shows the brilliant result of the way of earth.
xiang.modern_ja: まっすぐで正直な行動が、素晴らしい結果につながります。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：含章可貞。或從王事，无成有終。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, (shows its subject) keeping his excellence under restraint, but firmly maintaining it. If he should have occasion to engage in the king's service, though he will not claim the success (for himself), he will bring affairs to a good issue.
3.modern_ja: 自分の才能を前面に出すより、控えめに保つ時期です。成果を主張しなくても、最終的にはうまく収まります。

xiang.classic: 含章可貞；以時發也。或從王事，知光大也。
xiang.modern: 'He keeps his excellence tinder restraint, but firmly maintains it:' - at the proper time he will manifest it. 'He may have occasion to engage in the king's service: - great is the glory of his wisdom.
xiang.modern_ja: 才能を発揮するタイミングは、いずれ訪れます。今は静かに力を蓄えておく時期だとと考えて大丈夫です。焦らなくて大丈夫です。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, (shows the symbol of) a sack tied up. There will be no ground for blame or for praise.
4.modern_ja: 今は目立たないようにしている方がいい時期です。無理に動かなくても問題はありませんし、かといって評価されることもない、そんな時期です。

xiang.modern: 'A sack tied up; - there will be no error:' - this shows how, through carefulness, no injury will be received.
xiang.modern_ja: 慎重に行動することで、トラブルを避けられます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：黃裳，元吉。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, (shows) the yellow lower garment. There will be great good fortune.
5.modern_ja: 控えめでありながらも、確かな存在感がある時期です。大きな幸運が期待できます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

xiang.modern: S. 'The Yellow lower-garment; - there will be great good fortune:' - this follows from that ornamental (colour's) being in the right and central place.
xiang.modern_ja: バランスの取れた中庸の姿勢が、大きな幸運を呼び込みます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：龍戰于野，其血玄黃。
6.modern: The sixth SIX, divided (shows) dragons fighting in the wild. Their blood is purple and yellow.
6.modern_ja: 頑張りすぎると衝突が起こりやすい時期です。無理に自分を押し通そうとすると、傷つくことになりかねません。

xiang.modern: 'The dragons fight in the wild: - the (onward) course (indicated by Kun) is pursued to extremity.
xiang.modern_ja: 行き過ぎると、反動が来やすい時期です。ほどほどの加減を意識することで、安定した状態を保てます。

use_six.label: 用六
use_six.modern: (The lines of this hexagram are all weak and divided, as appears from) the use of the number six. If those (who are thus represented) be perpetually correct and firm, advantage will arise.
use_six.modern_ja: 長く正しい姿勢を保ち続けることで、良い結果が生まれます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

xiang.modern: '(The lines are all weak and divided, as appears from) the use of the number SIX: - but (those who are thus represented) becoming perpetually correct and firm, there will thereby be a great consummation.
xiang.modern_ja: 一貫した姿勢を保つことで、最終的には大きな成果につながります。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

appendix.classic: 《文言》曰：《坤》至柔而動也剛，至靜而德方，後得主而有常，含萬物而化光。坤道其順乎，承天而時行。
appendix.modern: (What is indicated by) Kun is most gentle and weak, but, when put in motion, is hard and strong; it is most still, but is able to give every definite form. 'By following, it obtains its (proper) lord,' and pursues its regular (course). It contains all things in itself, and its transforming (power) is glorious. Yes, what docility marks the way of Kun! It receives the influences of heaven, and acts at the proper time.
appendix.modern_ja: 柔らかく見えても、動くときには力強さを発揮できます。静かでありながらも、確かな形を作り出す力があります。タイミングを見極めて動くことで、素晴らしい変化を生み出せる時期です。

judgment.classic: 屯：元亨，利貞，勿用有攸往，利建侯。
judgment.modern: Zhun (indicates that in the case which it presupposes) there will be great progress and success, and the advantage will come from being correct and firm. (But) any movement in advance should not be (lightly) undertaken. There will be advantage in appointing feudal princes.
judgment.modern_ja: 物事の始まりには困難がつきものです。焦って動くのではなく、しっかりと基盤を固めることが大切な時期。仲間や協力者を得ることで、道が開けていきます。

tuan.classic: 屯，剛柔始交而難生，動乎險中，大亨貞。雷雨之動滿盈，天造草昧，宜建侯而不寧。
tuan.modern: In Zhun we have the strong (Qian) and the weak (Kun) commencing their intercourse, and difficulties arising. Movement in the midst of peril gives rise to 'great progress and success, (through) firm correctness.' By the action of the thunder and rain, (which are symbols of Kan and Zhen), all (between heaven and earth) is filled up. But the condition of the time is full of irregularity and obscurity. Feudal princes should be established, but the feeling that rest and peace have been secured should not be indulged (even then).
tuan.modern_ja: 新しいことを始める時は、混乱や困難が生じやすいものです。それは当たり前のこと。でも、その中で正しい道を進んでいけば、前に進めます。油断せず、着実に歩むことが大切です。

xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) clouds and (that representing) thunder form Zhun. The superior man, in accordance with this, (adjusts his measures of government) as in sorting the threads of the warp and woof.
xiang.modern_ja: 複雑な状況を整理していく時期です。混乱した糸を一本ずつ解きほぐすように、順序立てて取り組むことで、道が開けていきます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：磐桓；利居貞，利建侯。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows the difficulty (its subject has) in advancing. It will be advantageous for him to abide correct and firm; advantageous (also) to be made a feudal ruler.
1.modern_ja: 前に進みづらさを感じる時期かもしれません。でも、焦らなくて大丈夫です。今は土台を固めることに意識を向けると、後々の飛躍につながります。

xiang.classic: 雖磐桓，志行正也。以貴下賤，大得民也。
xiang.modern: Although 'there is a difficulty in advancing,' the mind (of the subject of the line) is set on doing what is correct. While noble, he humbles himself to the mean, and grandly gains the people.
xiang.modern_ja: 進みにくくても、正しい方向を向いていれば問題ありません。謙虚な姿勢が信頼を集めます。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：屯如邅如，乘馬班如。匪寇婚媾，女子貞不字，十年乃字。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows (its subject) distressed and obliged to return; (even) the horses of her chariot (also) seem to be retreating. (But) not by a spoiler (is she assailed), but by one who seeks her to be his wife. The young lady maintains her firm correctness, and declines a union. After ten years she will be united, and have children.
2.modern_ja: 思うように進まず、戸惑う時期かもしれません。でも、それは敵ではなく味方からの働きかけです。すぐに結論を出さなくていい。時間をかければ、良い結果につながります。

xiang.classic: 六二之難，乘剛也。十年乃字，反常也。
xiang.modern: The difficulty (to the subject of) the second six, (divided), arises from, its place over the undivided line below it. 'The union and children after ten years' shows things resuming their regular course.
xiang.modern_ja: 今の困難は一時的なものです。時間が経てば、自然と物事は良い方向に向かいます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：即鹿无虞，惟入于林中，君子幾不如舍，往吝。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows one following the deer without (the guidance of) the forester, and only finding himself in the midst of the forest. The superior man, acquainted with the secret risks, thinks it better to give up the chase. If he went forward, he would regret it.
3.modern_ja: ガイドなしで追いかけると、森の中で迷ってしまいます。今は無理に追わず、引き返す勇気も大切です。

xiang.classic: 即鹿无虞，以縱禽也。君子舍之，往吝窮也。
xiang.modern: 'One pursues the deer without the (guidance of the) forester:' - (he does so) in (his eagerness to) follow the game. 'The superior man gives up the chase, (knowing that) if he go forward he will regret it:' - he would be reduced to extremity.
xiang.modern_ja: 欲に駆られて突き進むと、行き詰まってしまいます。時には手を引くことも必要です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：乘馬班如，求婚媾，往吉，无不利。
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows (its subject as a lady), the horses of whose chariot appear in retreat. She seeks, however, (the help of) him who seeks her to be his wife. Advance will be fortunate; all will turn out advantageously.
4.modern_ja: 助けを求めることで、前に進める時期です。一人で抱え込まず、協力者を探すことが吉につながります。周囲に頼ることは弱さではありません。

xiang.modern: 'Going forward after such a search (for a helper)' shows intelligence.
xiang.modern_ja: 助けを求めて動くのは、賢い選択です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：屯其膏，小貞吉，大貞凶。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the difficulties in the way of (its subject's) dispensing the rich favours that might be expected from him. With firmness and correctness there will be good fortune in small things; (even) with them in great things there will be evil.
5.modern_ja: 恵みを与えたくても、なかなかうまくいかない時期かもしれません。小さなことからコツコツ始めるのが吉。大きなことを急ぐと裏目に出やすいです。

xiang.modern: 'Difficulty is experienced (by the subject of the fifth line) in bestowing his rich favours:' - the extent to which they reach will not yet be conspicuous.
xiang.modern_ja: 恩恵を広げるのに苦労する時期です。すぐに成果が見えなくても、焦る必要はありません。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：乘馬班如，泣血漣如。
6.modern: The topmost SIX, divided, shows (its subject) with the horses of his chariot obliged to retreat, and weeping tears of blood in streams.
6.modern_ja: 進退窮まって、辛い状況かもしれません。今は無理に動かず、状況が落ち着くのを待つ時期です。

xiang.modern: 'He weeps tears of blood in streams:' - how can the state (thus emblemed) continue long?
xiang.modern_ja: 今の辛い状況は、長くは続きません。じっと耐える時期です。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

judgment.classic: 蒙：亨。匪我求童蒙，童蒙求我。初筮告，再三瀆，瀆則不告。利貞。
judgment.modern: Meng (indicates that in the case which it presupposes) there will be progress and success. I do not (go and) seek the youthful and inexperienced, but he comes and seeks me. When he shows (the sincerity that marks) the first recourse to divination, I instruct him. If he apply a second and third time, that is troublesome; and I do not instruct the troublesome. There will be advantage in being firm and correct.
judgment.modern_ja: 未熟さや分からないことがあるのは、成長の始まりです。真剣に学ぼうとする姿勢があれば、答えは見つかります。ただし、何度も同じことを繰り返し聞くのは良くありません。一度受け取った教えを大切にすることで、道が開けます。

tuan.classic: 蒙，山下有險，險而止，蒙。蒙亨，以亨行時中也。匪我求童蒙，童蒙求我，志應也。初噬告，以剛中也。再三瀆，瀆則不告，瀆蒙也。蒙以養正，聖功也。
tuan.modern: In Meng we have (the trigram for) a mountain, and below it that of a rugged defile with a stream in it. The conditions of peril and arrest of progress (suggested by these) give (the idea in) Meng. 'Meng indicates that there will be progress and success:' - for there is development at work in it, and its time of action is exactly what is right. 'I do not seek the youthful and inexperienced; he seeks me:' - so does will respond to will. 'When he shows (the sincerity that marks) the first recourse to divination, I instruct him:' - for possessing the qualities of the undivided line and being in the central place, (the subject of the second line thus speaks). 'A second and third application create annoyance, and I do not instruct so as to create annoyance:' - annoyance (he means) to the ignorant. (The method of dealing with) the young and ignorant is to nourish the correct (nature belonging to them); - this accomplishes the service of the sage.
tuan.modern_ja: 困難や障害があっても、正しい方向に進もうとする意志があれば、成長できます。学ぶ姿勢を大切にし、正しいことを育んでいくことで、道が開けていきます。

xiang.classic: 山下出泉，蒙；君子以果行育德。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) a mountain, and beneath it that for a spring issuing forth form Meng. The superior man, in accordance with this, strives to be resolute in his conduct and nourishes his virtue.
xiang.modern_ja: 山から清らかな泉が湧き出るように、決断力を持ち、徳を育む時期です。この時期の意味を理解することで、より良い選択ができます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：發蒙，利用刑人，用說桎梏，以往吝。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, (has respect to) the dispelling of ignorance. It will be advantageous to use punishment (for that purpose), and to remove the shackles (from the mind). But going on in that way (of punishment) will give occasion for regret.
1.modern_ja: 学び始めは厳しさも必要かもしれません。でも、厳しすぎると逆効果。バランスが大切です。

xiang.modern: 'It will be advantageous to use punishment:' - the object being to bring under the influence of correcting law.
xiang.modern_ja: 規律を設けることで、正しい道に導けます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：包蒙吉；納婦吉；子克家。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, (shows its subject) exercising forbearance with the ignorant, in which there will be good fortune; and admitting (even the goodness of women, which will also be fortunate. (He may be described also as) a son able to (sustain the burden of) his family.
2.modern_ja: 未熟な人を寛容に受け入れることで、良い結果が生まれます。責任を担う力が備わっている時期です。

xiang.modern: 'A son able to (sustain the burden of) his family:' - as appears from the reciprocation between this strong line and the weak (fifth line).
xiang.modern_ja: 強さと柔らかさのバランスが取れていて、家庭や組織を支える力があります。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：勿用取女；見金夫，不有躬，无攸利。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, (seems to say) that one should not marry a woman whose emblem it might be, for that, when she sees a man of wealth, she will not keep her person from him, and in no wise will advantage come from her.
3.modern_ja: 目先の利益や外見にとらわれて判断すると、後で困ることになります。本質を見極めることが大切です。

xiang.modern: 'A woman (such as is here represented) should not be taken in marriage:' - her conduct is not agreeable to what is right.
xiang.modern_ja: 正しくない行動は、良い結果につながりません。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, (shows its subject as if) bound in chains of ignorance. There will be occasion for regret.
4.modern_ja: 分からないことに囲まれて、身動きが取れない感覚かもしれません。この状況を脱するには、助けを求めることも必要です。

xiang.modern: 'The regret arising from ignorance bound in chains' is due to the special distance of (the subject of this line) from the solidity (shown in lines 2 and 6).
xiang.modern_ja: 一人で抱え込むことで、困難が増しています。支えになる人を探すことで、状況が好転します。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：童蒙，吉。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows its subject as a simple lad without experience. There will be good fortune.
5.modern_ja: 純粋で謙虚な姿勢が、幸運を呼び込みます。知らないことを素直に認める姿勢が大切です。

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune belonging to the simple lad without experience' comes from his docility going on to humility.
xiang.modern_ja: 素直で謙虚な姿勢が、良い結果につながる時期です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：擊蒙；不利為寇，利禦寇。
6.modern: In the topmost NINE, undivided, we see one smiting the ignorant (youth). But no advantage will come from doing him an injury. Advantage would come from warding off injury from him.
6.modern_ja: 厳しく叩くのではなく、守り育てる姿勢が必要な時期です。攻撃よりも防御に力を入れることで、良い結果が生まれます。

xiang.modern: 'Advantage will come from warding off injury:' - (the subject of this line) above and (the ignorant) below, all do and are done to in accordance with their nature.
xiang.modern_ja: 上下の関係がうまく機能するために、守る姿勢が大切です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

judgment.classic: 需：有孚，光亨，貞吉。利涉大川。
judgment.modern: Xu intimates that, with the sincerity which is declared in it, there will be brilliant success. With firmness there will be good fortune; and it will be advantageous to cross the great stream.
judgment.modern_ja: 今は「待つ」ことが大切な時期です。信念を持って正しい道を歩んでいれば、道は開けます。焦らず、タイミングを見計らうことが吉につながります。

tuan.classic: 需，須也；險在前也。剛健而不陷，其義不困窮矣。需有孚，光亨，貞吉。位乎天位，以正中也。利涉大川，往有功也。
tuan.modern: Xu denotes waiting. (The figure) shows peril in front; but notwithstanding the firmness and strength (indicated by the inner trigram), its subject does not allow himself to be involved (in the dangerous defile); - it is right he should not be straitened or reduced to extremity. When it is said that, 'with the sincerity declared in Xu, there will be brilliant success, and with firmness there will be good fortune,' this is shown by the position (of the fifth line) in the place assigned by Heaven, and its being the correct position for it, and in the centre. 'It will be advantageous to go through the great stream;' - that is, going forward will be followed by meritorious achievement.
tuan.modern_ja: 目の前に危険があるように見えても、慌てて飛び込む必要はありません。しっかりと待つことで、困難を避けながら前に進めます。正しいタイミングで動けば、成果を得られます。

xiang.classic: 雲上於天，需；君子以飲食宴樂。
xiang.modern: (The trigram for) clouds ascending over that for the sky forms Xu. The superior man, in accordance with this, eats and drinks, feasts and enjoys himself (as if there were nothing else to employ him).
xiang.modern_ja: 待つ時間を有意義に過ごすことが大切です。焦らず、今できることを楽しみながら、時を待つ姿勢が良い結果を引き寄せます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：需于郊。利用恆，无咎。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject waiting in the distant border. It will be well for him constantly to maintain (the purpose thus shown), in which case there will be no error.
1.modern_ja: まだ中心から離れた場所で待っている段階です。一貫した姿勢を保っていれば、問題ありません。

xiang.classic: 需于郊，不犯難行也。利用恆，无咎；未失常也。
xiang.modern: 'He is waiting in the (distant) border:' - he makes no movement to encounter rashly the difficulties (of the situation). 'It will be advantageous for him constantly to maintain (the purpose thus shown), in which case there will be no error:' - he will not fail to pursue that regular course.
xiang.modern_ja: 無理に困難に飛び込まず、着実に進む姿勢が正しいです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：需于沙。小有言，終吉。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject waiting on the sand (of the mountain stream). He will (suffer) the small (injury of) being spoken (against), but in the end there will be good fortune.
2.modern_ja: 少し批判を受けるかもしれませんが、最終的には良い結果になります。気にしすぎず、待つことで道が開けます。

xiang.classic: 需于沙，衍在中也。雖小有言，以終吉也。
xiang.modern: 'He is waiting on the sand:' - he occupies his position in the centre with a generous forbearance. Though 'he suffer the small injury of being spoken (against),' he will bring things to a good issue.
xiang.modern_ja: 寛容な姿勢を保つことで、最終的にはうまくいきます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：需于泥，致寇至。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject in the mud (close by the stream). He thereby invites the approach of injury.
3.modern_ja: 危険に近づきすぎている状態です。このままでは問題を招きやすいので、少し距離を取った方がいいかもしれません。

xiang.classic: 需于泥，災在外也。自我致寇，敬慎不敗也。
xiang.modern: 'He is waiting in the mud:' - calamity is (close at hand, and as it were) in the outer (trigram). 'He himself invites the approach of injury:' - if he be reverent and careful, he will not be worsted.
xiang.modern_ja: 慎重に行動すれば、問題を避けられます。油断は禁物です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject waiting in (the place of) blood. But he will get out of the cavern.
4.modern_ja: 困難な状況の中にいますが、そこから抜け出せます。状況に順応しながら、チャンスを待つことで道が開けます。

xiang.modern: 'He is waiting in (the place of) blood:' - he accommodates himself (to the circumstances of the time), and hearkens to (its requirements).
xiang.modern_ja: 状況を受け入れ、柔軟に対応することで、道が開けます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：需于酒食，貞吉。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject waiting amidst the appliances of a feast. Through his firmness and correctness there will be good fortune.
5.modern_ja: ゆとりを持って待てる状況です。正しい姿勢を保っていれば、良い結果が待っています。

xiang.modern: 'The appliances of a feast, and the good fortune through being firm and correct,' are indicated by (the position in) the central and correct place.
xiang.modern_ja: 中庸を保ち、正しい道を歩むことで幸運が訪れます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：入于穴，有不速之客三人來，敬之終吉。
6.modern: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject entered into the cavern. (But) there are three guests coming, without being urged, (to his help). If he receive them respectfully, there will be good fortune in the end.
6.modern_ja: 予期せぬ助けが来る時期です。それを丁寧に受け入れることで、最終的には良い結果になります。

xiang.classic: 不速之客來，敬之終吉。雖不當位，未大失也。
xiang.modern: 'Guests come unurged (to give their help), and if (the subject of the line) receive them respectfully, there will be good fortune in the end:' - though the occupant and the place are not suited to each other, there has been no great failure (in what has been done).
xiang.modern_ja: 状況が完璧でなくても、謙虚に助けを受け入れることで、うまくいきます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

judgment.classic: 訟：有孚，窒。惕中吉。終凶。利見大人，不利涉大川。
judgment.modern: Song intimates how, though there is sincerity in one's contention, he will yet meet with opposition and obstruction; but if he cherish an apprehensive caution, there will be good fortune, while, if he must prosecute the contention to the (bitter) end, there will be evil. It will be advantageous to see the great man; it will not be advantageous to cross the great stream.
judgment.modern_ja: 争いや対立が生じやすい時期です。慎重に対処し、大きな決断は控えることが賢明です。信頼できる仲介者を見つけることで、状況が改善に向かいます。

tuan.classic: 訟，上剛下險，險而健訟。訟有孚窒，惕中吉，剛來而得中也。終凶；訟不可成也。利見大人；尚中正也。不利涉大川；入于淵也。
tuan.modern: The upper portion of Song is (the trigram representing) strength, and the lower (that representing) peril. (The coming together of) strength and peril gives (the idea in) Song. 'Song intimates how, though there is sincerity in one's contention, he will yet meet with opposition and obstruction; but if he cherish an apprehensive caution, there will be good fortune:' - a strong (line) has come and got the central place (in the lower trigram).'If he must prosecute the contention to the (bitter) end, there will be evil:' - contention is not a thing to be carried on to extremity. 'It will be advantageous to meet with the great man:' - what he sets a value on is the due mean, and the correct place. 'It will not be advantageous to cross the great stream:' - one (attempting to do so) would find himself in an abyss.
tuan.modern_ja: 上に強さ、下に危険がある構図です。争いを避けるのが難しくても、途中で収めることで良い結果につながります。最後まで争うと、望まない結末を招きやすいです。

xiang.classic: 天與水違行，訟；君子以作事謀始。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) heaven and (that representing) water, moving away from each other, form Song. The superior man, in accordance with this, in the transaction of affairs takes good counsel about his first steps.
xiang.modern_ja: 何事も始める前に、よく考えることが大切です。計画を練り直すことで、後のトラブルを避けられます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：不永所事，小有言，終吉。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject not perpetuating the matter about which (the contention is). He will suffer the small (injury) of being spoken against, but the end will be fortunate.

xiang.classic: 不永所事，訟不可長也。雖有小言，其辯明也。
xiang.modern: 'He does not perpetuate the matter about which (the contention is):' - contention should not be prolonged. Although 'he may suffer the small (injury) of being spoken against,' his argument is clear.
xiang.modern_ja: 争いは長く続けるものではありません。明確な理由があれば、周囲も理解してくれます。

1.modern_ja: 争いを長引かせないことが吉につながります。少し言われることがあっても、最終的には良い結果になります。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：不克訟，歸而逋，其邑人三百戶，无眚。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject unequal to the contention. If he retire and keep concealed (where) the inhabitants of his city are (only) three hundred families, he will fall into no mistake.

xiang.classic: 不克訟，歸而逋也。自下訟上，患至掇也。
xiang.modern: 'He is unequal to the contention; he retires and keeps concealed, stealthily withdrawing from it:' - for him from his lower place to contend with (the stronger one) above, would be to (invite) calamity, as if he brought it with his hand to himself.
xiang.modern_ja: 格上の相手と争うと、かえって困難を招きます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 争いに勝てない状況です。一歩引いて静かに過ごすことで、災いを避けられます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：食舊德，貞厲，終吉，或從王事，无成。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject keeping in the old place assigned for his support, and firmly correct. Perilous as the position is, there will be good fortune in the end. Should he perchance engage in the king's business, he will not (claim the merit of) achievement.

xiang.modern: 'He confines himself to the support assigned to him of old:' - (thus) following those above him, he will have good fortune.
xiang.modern_ja: 上の人に従うことで、良い結果につながります。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

3.modern_ja: 今あるものを守り、堅実に過ごすことが吉です。成果を主張しなくても、最終的には認められます。

4.label: 九四
4.classic: 九四：不克訟，復即命渝，安貞吉。
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject unequal to the contention. He returns to (the study of Heaven's) ordinances, changes (his wish to contend), and rests in being firm and correct. There will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'He returns to (the study of Heaven's) ordinances, changes (his wish to contend), and rests in being firm and correct:' - he does not fail (in doing what is right).
xiang.modern_ja: 本来の道に戻ることで、過ちを避けられます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.modern_ja: 争いをやめて、本来あるべき道に戻ることが吉です。心を落ち着けて、正しい道を選び直す時期です。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：訟元吉。
5.modern: S. The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject contending - and with great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'He contends; - and 'with great fortune: - this is shown by his holding the due mean and being in the correct place.
xiang.modern_ja: 中心にいて正しい位置にあることが、良い結果を生みます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.modern_ja: 正しい立場から争うことで、大きな吉を得られます。中庸を保ち、正しい位置にいることが重要です。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：或錫之鞶帶，終朝三褫之。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows how its subject may have the leathern belt conferred on him (by the sovereign), and thrice it shall be taken from him in a morning.

xiang.modern: 'He receives the robe through his contention:' - but still be is not deserving of respect.
xiang.modern_ja: 争いで得たものは、敬意を集めにくいです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

6.modern_ja: 争いに勝っても、その成果は長く保てません。勝利を誇示しすぎると、かえって失うものが増えます。

judgment.classic: 師：貞，丈人，吉无咎。
judgment.modern: Shi indicates how, in the case which it supposes, with firmness and correctness, and (a leader of) age and experience, there will be good fortune and no error.
judgment.modern_ja: 組織やチームを率いる時期です。経験と人徳のあるリーダーのもとで動くことで、良い結果が期待できます。

tuan.classic: 師，眾也，貞正也，能以眾正，可以王矣。剛中而應，行險而順，以此毒天下，而民從之，吉又何咎矣。
tuan.modern: (The name) Shi describes the multitude (of the host). The 'firmness and correctness' (which the hexagram indicates) refer to (moral) correctness (of aim). When (the mover) is able to use the multitude with such correctness, he may attain to the royal sway. There is (the symbol of) strength in the centre (of the trigram below), and it is responded to (by its proper correlate above). The action gives rise to perils, but is in accordance (with the best sentiments of men). (Its mover) may by such action distress all the country, but the people will follow him; - there will be good fortune, and what error should there be?
tuan.modern_ja: 正しい統率のもとで多くの人を導けば、大きな力となり、周囲もついてきます。危険な状況でも、順序立てて動けば成功につながります。

xiang.classic: 地中有水，師；君子以容民畜眾。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) the earth and in the midst of it that representing water, form Shi. The superior man, in accordance with this, nourishes and educates the people, and collects (from among them) the multitudes (of the hosts).
xiang.modern_ja: 人々を育て、組織をまとめる力が求められる時期です。包容力を持って人材を活かすことが大切です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：師出以律，否臧凶。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows the host going forth according to the rules (for such a movement). If these be not good, there will be evil.

xiang.modern: 'The host goes forth according to the rules (for) such a movement:' - if those rules be not observed, there will be evil.
xiang.modern_ja: 秩序を失うと、凶を招きます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

1.modern_ja: 規律に従って動くことが大切です。ルールを無視すると、問題が生じやすくなります。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：在師中吉，无咎，王三錫命。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows (the leader) in the midst of the host. There will be good fortune and no error. The king has thrice conveyed to him the orders (of his favour).

xiang.classic: 在師中吉，承天寵也。王三錫命，懷萬邦也。
xiang.modern: 'He is in the midst of the host, and there will be good fortune:' - he has received the favour of Heaven. 'The king has thrice conveyed to him the orders (of) his favour:' - (the king) cherishes the myriad regions in his heart.
xiang.modern_ja: 天の恵みを受け、多くの国や人々を思いやる心が必要です。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.modern_ja: チームの中心にいることで、良い結果が生まれます。上からの信頼を得て、大きな役割を担えます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：師或輿尸，凶。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows how the host may, possibly, have many inefficient leaders. There will be evil.

xiang.modern: 'The host with the possibility of its having many idle leaders:' - great will be its want of success.
xiang.modern_ja: リーダーが多すぎると、成果が上がりません。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.modern_ja: リーダーが複数いると、うまくいきません。指揮系統を明確にすることが成功への鍵です。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows the host in retreat. There is no error.

xiang.modern: 'The host is in retreat; but there is no error:' - there has been no failure in the regular course.
xiang.modern_ja: 通常のやり方を守っていれば、問題ありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

4.modern_ja: 戦略的に退くことも、賢明な判断です。無理に前進せず、態勢を整える時期だと考えて良いです。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：田有禽，利執言，无咎。長子帥師，弟子輿尸，貞凶。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows birds in the fields, which it will be advantageous to seize (and destroy). In that case there will be no error. If the oldest son leads the host, and younger men (idly occupy offices assigned to them), however firm and correct he may be, there will be evil.

xiang.classic: 長子帥師，以中行也。弟子輿尸，使不當也。
xiang.modern: 'The oldest son leads the host:' - its movements are directed by him in accordance with his position in the centre. 'Younger men idly occupy their positions:' - the employment of such men is improper.
xiang.modern_ja: 経験者が率いることで、正しい方向に進めます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

5.modern_ja: 問題があれば対処し、経験ある人に任せることが吉です。若手に重要な役割を任せすぎると、問題が生じやすくなります。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：大君有命，開國承家，小人勿用。
6.modern: The topmost SIX, divided, shows the great ruler delivering his charges, (appointing some) to be rulers of states, and others to undertake the headship of clans; but small men should not be employed (in such positions).

xiang.classic: 大君有命，以正功也。小人勿用，必亂邦也。
xiang.modern: 'The great ruler delivers his charges:' - thereby he rightly apportions merit. 'Small men should not be employed:' - they are sure to throw the states into confusion.
xiang.modern_ja: 成果を正しく分配することで功績が認められます。小人を重用すると混乱を招きます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

6.modern_ja: 大きな成功の後は、成果を正しく分配することが大切です。貢献した人を適切に評価することで、組織が安定します。

judgment.classic: 比：吉。原筮元永貞，无咎。不寧方來，後夫凶。
judgment.modern: Bi indicates that (under the conditions which it supposes) there is good fortune. But let (the principal party intended in it) re-examine himself, (as if) by divination, whether his virtue be great, unintermitting, and firm. If it be so, there will be no error. Those who have not rest will then come to him; and with those who are (too) late in coming it will be ill.
judgment.modern_ja: 人との結びつきが重要な時期です。自分自身を見つめ直し、徳を高めることで、自然と良い仲間が集まってきます。遅れて参加しようとすると、うまくいきにくいです。

tuan.classic: 比，吉也，比，輔也，下順從也。原筮元永貞，无咎，以剛中也。不寧方來，上下應也。後夫凶，其道窮也。
tuan.modern: 'Bi indicates that there is good fortune:' - (the name) Bi denotes help; (and we see in the figure) inferiors docilely following (their superior). 'Let (the principal party intended in it) reexamine himself, (as if) by divination, whether his virtue be great, unintermitting, and firm; - if it be so, there will be no error: - all this follows from the position of the strong line in the centre (of the upper trigram). 'Those who have not rest will come to him:' - high and low will respond to its subject. 'With those who are (too) late in coming it will be ill:' - (for them) the way (of good fortune here indicated) has been exhausted.
tuan.modern_ja: 下が上に従い、助け合う形です。中心にいる強い存在に皆が応じ、良い結果が生まれます。タイミングを逃すと、その恩恵を受けられません。

xiang.classic: 地上有水，比；先王以建萬國，親諸侯。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) the earth, and over it (that representing) water, form Bi. The ancient kings, in accordance with this, established the various states and maintained an affectionate relation to their princes.
xiang.modern_ja: 古代の王は、国々を治め、諸侯との親しい関係を築きました。信頼関係を大切にする時期です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：有孚，比之，无咎。有孚盈缶，終來有它吉。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject seeking by his sincerity to win the attachment of his object. There will be no error. Let (the breast) be full of sincerity as an earthenware vessel is of its contents, and it will in the end bring other advantages.

xiang.modern: From 'the seeking union with its object' shown in the first SIX, (divided),there will be other advantages.
xiang.modern_ja: 誠実な結びつきには、他の良いことも伴います。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 誠実さを持って人と結びつくことで、良い結果が生まれます。心からの誠意があれば、思わぬ幸運も訪れます。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：比之自內，貞吉。
2.modern: In the second SIX, divided, we see the movement towards union and attachment proceeding from the inward (mind). With firm correctness there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The movement towards union and attachment proceeds from the inward (mind):' - (the party concerned) does not fail in what is proper to himself
xiang.modern_ja: 内から結びつくことで、自分らしさを保てます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.modern_ja: 内面から自然に結びつこうとする姿勢が吉です。自分を見失わないことが大切です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：比之匪人。
3.modern: In the third SIX, divided, we see its subject seeking for union with such as ought not to be associated with.

xiang.modern: 'Union is sought with such as ought not to be associated with:' - but will not injury be the result?
xiang.modern_ja: ふさわしくない相手との結びつきは、傷つく原因になります。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

3.modern_ja: 結びつくべきでない相手と関わると、問題が生じます。相手を選ぶ目を持つことが重要です。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: In the fourth SIX, divided, we see its subject seeking for union with the one beyond himself. With firm correctness there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'Union is sought (by the party intended here) with one beyond himself, and (in this case) with a worthy object:' - he is following (the ruler) above him.
xiang.modern_ja: 上にいる賢者に従うことで、良い結果が生まれます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: 外にいる賢い人と結びつくことが吉です。正しい道を歩む人についていくことで、良い方向に進めます。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：顯比，王用三驅，失前禽。邑人不誡，吉。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, affords the most illustrious instance of seeking union and attachment. (We seem to see in it) the king urging his pursuit of the game (only) in three directions, and allowing the escape of all the animals before him, while the people of his towns do not warn one another (to prevent it). There will be good fortune.

xiang.classic: 顯比之吉，位正中也。舍逆取順，失前禽也。邑人不誡，上使中也。
xiang.modern: 'The good fortune belonging to the most illustrious instance of seeking union and attachment' appears in the correct and central position (of the fifth line, undivided). (The king's) neglecting (the animals) confronting him (and then fleeing), and (only) taking those who present themselves as it were obediently, is seen in his allowing the escape of those in front of him.' 'That the people of his towns do not warn one another (to prevent such escape),' shows how he, in his high eminence, has made them pursue the due course.
xiang.modern_ja: 中心にあって正しい位置にいることが、良い結果を生みます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.modern_ja: 開かれた姿勢で人と結びつくことが吉です。無理に追わず、自然と集まる関係を大切にすることで、良い結果につながります。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：比之无首，凶。
6.modern: In the topmost SIX, divided, we see one seeking union and attachment without having taken the first step (to such an end). There will be evil.

xiang.modern: 'He seeks union and attachment without taking the first (step to such an end):' - there is no possibility of a (good) issue.
xiang.modern_ja: 始まりがなければ、良い終わりもありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

6.modern_ja: 最初から信頼関係を築く姿勢がなければ、良い結果は生まれません。スタートの姿勢が大切です。

judgment.classic: 小畜：亨。密雲不雨，自我西郊。
judgment.modern: Xiao Xu indicates that (under its conditions) there will be progress and success. (We see) dense clouds, but no rain coming from our borders in the west.
judgment.modern_ja: 力を少しずつ蓄える時期です。大きな動きはまだできませんが、準備を進めることで、やがて成果につながります。

tuan.classic: 小畜，柔得位，而上下應之，曰小畜。健而巽，剛中而志行，乃亨。密雲不雨，尚往也。自我西郊，施未行也。
tuan.modern: In Xiao Xu the weak line occupies its (proper) position, and (the lines) above and below respond to it. Hence comes the name of Xiao Xu (Small Restraint). (It presents the symbols of) strength and flexibility. Strong lines are in the central places, and the will (of their subjects) will have free course. Thus it indicates that there will be progress and success. 'Dense clouds but no rain' indicate the movement (of the strong lines) still going forward. The 'Commencing at our western border' indicates that the (beneficial) influence has not yet been widely displayed.
tuan.modern_ja: 柔らかいものが中心にあり、周囲と調和しています。力を蓄えながらも、まだ大きく動く時ではありません。着実に準備を進めることが大切です。

xiang.classic: 風行天上，小畜；君子以懿文德。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) the sky, and that representing wind moving above it, form Xiao Xu The superior man, in accordance with this, adorns the outward manifestation of his virtue.
xiang.modern_ja: 内面の徳を磨き、外見を整える時期です。地道な努力が、後の大きな成果につながります。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：復自道，何其咎，吉。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject returning and pursuing his own course. What mistake should he fall into? There will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'He returns and pursues his own path:' - it is right that there should be good fortune.
xiang.modern_ja: 自分の道を歩み続けることが、良い結果につながります。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 自分の道に戻って進むことが吉です。正しい方向に向かっていれば、問題ありません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：牽復，吉。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject, by the attraction (of the former line), returning (to the proper course). There will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'By the attraction (of the subject of the former line) he returns (to its own course),' and is in the central place: - neither will he err in what is due from him.
xiang.modern_ja: 中心にいて、自分を見失わないことが大切です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.modern_ja: 引き寄せられて正しい道に戻ることで、吉が生まれます。中道を保つことで、過ちを避けられます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：輿說輻，夫妻反目。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, suggests the idea of a carriage, the strap beneath which has been removed, or of a husband and wife looking on each other with averted eyes.

xiang.modern: 'Husband and wife look on each other with averted eyes:' - (the subject of line three is like a husband who) cannot maintain correctly his relations with his wife.
xiang.modern_ja: 関係を正しく保つことが難しい時期です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: パートナーとの関係がぎくしゃくしやすい時期です。お互いの期待が噛み合わないことがあるかもしれません。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：有孚，血去惕出，无咎。
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject possessed of sincerity. The danger of bloodshed is thereby averted, and his (ground for) apprehension dismissed. There will be no mistake.

xiang.modern: 'He is possessed of sincerity; his (ground for) apprehension is dismissed:' - (the subjects of the lines) above agree in aim with him.
xiang.modern_ja: 上と志が一致していれば、心配は不要です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: 誠実さがあれば、危険は去り、心配も解消されます。上の人と志が合っていることで、問題を避けられます。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：有孚攣如，富以其鄰。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject possessed of sincerity, and drawing others to unite with him. Rich in resources, he employs his neighbours (in the same cause with himself).

xiang.modern: 'He is possessed of sincerity, and draws others to unite with him:' - he does not use only his own rich resources.
xiang.modern_ja: 一人で富むのではなく、周囲と共に豊かになることが大切です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

5.modern_ja: 誠実さを持って周囲と結びつくことで、豊かさが生まれます。自分だけでなく、周りも巻き込んで進む時期です。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：既雨既處，尚德載，婦貞厲。月幾望，君子征凶。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows how the rain has fallen, and the (onward progress) is stayed - (so) must we value the full accumulation of the virtue (represented by the upper trigram). But a wife (exercising restraint), however firm and correct she may be, is in a position of peril, (and like) the moon approaching to the full. If the superior man prosecute his measures (in such circumstances), there will be evil.

xiang.classic: 既雨既處，德積載也。君子征凶，有所疑也。
xiang.modern: 'The rain has fallen and (the onward progress) is stayed:' - the power (denoted in the figure) has accumulated to the full. 'If the superior man prosecute his measures, there will be evil:' - he will find himself obstructed.
xiang.modern_ja: 力が十分に蓄積されました。ただし、慎重に進まないと障害に遭いやすいです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

6.modern_ja: 成果が実り、進むべき道が定まりました。ただし、頂点に達した後は慎重さが必要です。無理に進むと問題が生じやすくなります。

judgment.classic: 履虎尾，不咥人，亨。
judgment.modern: (Lu suggests the idea of) one treading on the tail of a tiger, which does not bite him. There will be progress and success.
judgment.modern_ja: 虎の尾を踏むような危険な状況でも、慎重に行動すれば噛まれずに済みます。礼儀と節度を守ることで、前に進めます。

tuan.classic: 履，柔履剛也。說而應乎乾，是以履虎尾，不咥人，亨。剛中正，履帝位而不疚，光明也。
tuan.modern: In Lu we have (the symbol of) weakness treading on (that of) strength. (The lower trigram) indicates pleasure and satisfaction, and responds to (the upper) indicating strength. Hence (it is said), 'He treads on the tail of a tiger, which does not bite him; there will be progress and success.' (The fifth line is) strong, in the centre, and in its correct place. (Its subject) occupies the God-(given) position, and falls into no distress or failure; - (his) action will be brilliant.
tuan.modern_ja: 柔らかさが強さの上を歩む形です。喜びを持って強さに応じることで、危険を避けながら進めます。中心にいて正しい位置にあれば、輝かしい道が開けます。

xiang.classic: 上天下澤，履；君子以辨上下，安民志。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) the sky above, and below it (that representing the waters of) a marsh, form Lu. The superior man, in accordance with this, discriminates between high and low, and gives settlement to the aims of the people.
xiang.modern_ja: 上下の区別をわきまえ、人々の志を安定させることが大切な時期です。秩序を保つことで、混乱を避けられます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：素履，往无咎。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject treading his accustomed path. If he go forward, there will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He treads his accustomed path and goes forward:' - singly and exclusively he carries out his (long-cherished) wishes.
xiang.modern_ja: 自分の望む道を一人で歩むことが、良い結果を生みます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

1.modern_ja: 慣れた道を歩み続けることで、問題なく前に進めます。派手なことより堅実さが吉につながります。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：履道坦坦，幽人貞吉。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject treading the path that is level and easy - a quiet and solitary man, to whom, if he be firm and correct, there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'A quiet and solitary man, to whom, being firm and correct, there will be good fortune:' - holding the due mean, he will not allow himself to be thrown into disorder.
xiang.modern_ja: 中道を保ち、自分を乱さないことが大切です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 平坦で広い道を静かに歩む人が吉を得ます。正しい道を保つことで、心が乱れません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：眇能視，跛能履，履虎尾，咥人，凶。武人為于大君。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows a one-eyed man (who thinks he) can see; a lame man (who thinks he) can walk well; one who treads on the tail of a tiger and is bitten. (All this indicates) ill fortune. We have a (mere) bravo acting the part of a great ruler.

xiang.classic: 眇能視；不足以有明也。跛能履；不足以與行也，咥人之凶；位不當也。武人為于大君；志剛也。
xiang.modern: 'A one-eyed man (who thinks that he) can see:' - he is not fit to see clearly. 'A lame man (who thinks that he can) tread well:' - one cannot walk along with him. 'The ill fortune of being bitten' arises from the place not being the proper one for him. 'A (mere) bravo acting the part of a great ruler:' - this is owing to his aims being (too) violent.
xiang.modern_ja: 能力不足なのに進もうとすると、適切な対応ができません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: 自分の能力を過信すると、危険を招きます。実力以上のことをしようとすると、問題が生じやすいです。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject treading on the tail of a tiger. He becomes full of apprehensive caution, and in the end there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'He becomes full of apprehensive caution, and in the end there will be good fortune:' - his aim takes effect.
xiang.modern_ja: 慎重に行動すれば、目的を達成できます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

4.modern_ja: 危険な状況でも、慎重に注意深く行動すれば、最終的には良い結果になります。用心を怠らないことが大切です。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：夬履，貞厲。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the resolute tread of its subject. Though he be firm and correct, there will be peril.

xiang.modern: 'He treads resolutely; and though he be firm and correct, there is peril:' - this is due to his being in the position that is correct and appropriate to him.
xiang.modern_ja: 正しい位置にいながら決断することが求められます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

5.modern_ja: 決断力を持って進むことで成果を得られますが、その分慎重さも必要です。正しい位置にいることで、力を発揮できます。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：視履考祥，其旋元吉。
6.modern: The sixth NINE, undivided, tells us to look at (the whole course) that is trodden, and examine the presage which that gives. If it be complete and without failure, there will be great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'There will be great good fortune,' and that in the occupancy of the topmost line: - this is great matter for congratulation.
xiang.modern_ja: 最上位にいることで、大きな祝福があります。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

6.modern_ja: これまでの歩みを振り返り、その結果を見極めることで、大きな吉が生まれます。最高の位置で大きな喜びを得られます。

judgment.classic: 泰：小往大來，吉亨。
judgment.modern: In Tai (we see) the little gone and the great come. (It indicates that) there will be good fortune, with progress and success.
judgment.modern_ja: 順調に物事が進む時期です。小さなものが去り、大きなものが来る流れにあります。積極的に動くことで、良い結果が期待できます。

tuan.classic: 泰，小往大來，吉亨。則是天地交，而萬物通也；上下交，而其志同也。內陽而外陰，內健而外順，內君子而外小人，君子道長，小人道消也。
tuan.modern: 'The little come and the great gone in Tai, and its indication that there will be good fortune with progress and success' show to us heaven and earth in communication with each other, and all things in consequence having free course, and (also) the high and the low, (superiors and inferiors), in communication with one another, and possessed by the same aim. The inner (trigram) is made up of the strong and undivided lines, and the outer of the weak and divided; the inner is (the symbol of) strength, and the outer of docility; the inner (represents) the superior man, and the outer the small man. (Thus) the way of the superior man appears increasing, and that of the small man decreasing.
tuan.modern_ja: 天と地が交わり、万物が通じ合う時期です。上下が心を通わせ、同じ方向を向いています。内に強さを持ち、外に柔軟さがあることで、バランスの取れた発展ができます。

xiang.classic: 天地交泰，后以財成天地之道，輔相天地之宜，以左右民。
xiang.modern: (The trigrams for) heaven and earth in communication together form Tai. The (sage) sovereign, in harmony with this, fashions and completes (his regulations) after the courses of heaven and earth, and assists the application of the adaptations furnished by them, - in order to benefit the people.
xiang.modern_ja: 天地が交わる時期です。限りない恩恵を人々に施し、サポートしていくことが大切です。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：拔茅茹，以其彙，征吉。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, suggests the idea of grass pulled up, and bringing with it other stalks with whose roots it is connected. Advance (on the part of its subject) will be fortunate.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune of advance, (as suggested by the emblem of) the grass pulled up,' arises from the will (of the party intended) being set on what is external to himself.
xiang.modern_ja: 外に向かって進もうとする志があることで、吉が生まれます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

1.modern_ja: 仲間と共に前進することで、良い結果が生まれます。根っこでつながった存在と共に動くことが吉です。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：包荒，用馮河，不遐遺，朋亡，得尚于中行。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows one who can bear with the uncultivated, will cross the He without a boat, does not forget the distant, and has no (selfish) friendships. Thus does he prove himself acting in accordance with the course of the due Mean.

xiang.classic: 包荒，得尚于中行，以光大也。
xiang.modern: 'He bears with the uncultivated, and proves himself acting in accordance with the due mean:' - for (his intelligence is) bright and (his capacity is) great.
xiang.modern_ja: 寛容さを持って中道を歩むことで、輝かしい成果が得られます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 困難な人にも寛容に接し、遠くのことも忘れずにいることが大切です。偏らない姿勢で中道を歩むことで、良い結果につながります。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：无平不陂，无往不復，艱貞无咎。勿恤其孚，于食有福。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows that, while there is no state of peace that is not liable to be disturbed, and no departure (of evil men) so that they shall not return, yet when one is firm and correct, as he realises the distresses that may arise, he will commit no error. There is no occasion for sadness at the certainty (of such recurring changes); and in this mood the happiness (of the present) may be (long) enjoyed.

xiang.modern: 'There is no going away so that there shall not be a return' refers to this as the point where the interaction of heaven and earth takes place.
xiang.modern_ja: 去ったものが戻るのは、天地の道理です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

3.modern_ja: 平穏な状態は永遠には続きません。去ったものは戻り、困難もやがて訪れます。それを理解した上で、今の幸せを大切にすることが重要です。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：翩翩，不富，以其鄰，不戒以孚。
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject fluttering (down) - not relying on his own rich resources, but calling in his neighbours. (They all come) not as having received warning, but in the sincerity (of their hearts).

xiang.classic: 翩翩不富，皆失實也。不戒以孚，中心願也。
xiang.modern: 'He comes fluttering (down), not relying on his own rich resources:' - both he and his neighbours are out of their real (place where they are). 'They have not received warning, but (come) in the sincerity (of their hearts):' - this is what they have desired in the core of their hearts.
xiang.modern_ja: 皆が本来の場所を離れている状態です。誠意があれば、心から願いが叶います。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

4.modern_ja: 謙虚な姿勢で周囲と協力することで、良い結果が生まれます。誠意を持って接することが大切です。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：帝乙歸妹，以祉元吉。
5.modern: The fifth six, divided, reminds us of (king) Di-yi's (rule about the) marriage of his younger sister. By such a course there is happiness and there will be great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'By such a course there is happiness, and there will be great good fortune:' - (the subject of the line) employs the virtue proper to his central position to carry his wishes into effect.
xiang.modern_ja: 中心にいることで、願いを叶えられます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

5.modern_ja: 控えめな姿勢で良縁を結ぶことで、大きな幸せが訪れます。中心にいて願いを実現できる時期です。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：城復于隍，勿用師。自邑告命，貞吝。
6.modern: The sixth six, divided, shows us the city wall returned into the moat. It is not the time to use the army. (The subject of the line) may, indeed, announce his orders to the people of his own city; but however correct and firm he may be, he will have cause for regret.

xiang.modern: 'The city wall returned back into the moat' shows how the (governmental) orders have (long) been in disorder.
xiang.modern_ja: 命令が乱れている状態です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.modern_ja: 築いたものが崩れる時期が来ています。無理に動かず、身近なところから立て直すことが必要です。

judgment.classic: 否之匪人，不利君子貞，大往小來。
judgment.modern: In Pi there is the want of good understanding between the (different classes of) men, and its indication is unfavourable to the firm and correct course of the superior man. We see in it the great gone and the little come.
judgment.modern_ja: 物事が停滞しやすい時期です。大きなものが去り、小さなものが来る流れにあります。無理に動くより、時を待つ姿勢が大切です。

tuan.classic: 否之匪人，不利君子貞。大往小來，則是天地不交，而萬物不通也；上下不交，而天下无邦也。內陰而外陽，內柔而外剛，內小人而外君子。小人道長，君子道消也。
tuan.modern: 'The want of good understanding between the (different classes of) men in Pi, and its indication as unfavourable to the firm and correct course of the superior man; with the intimation that the great are gone and the little come:' - all this springs from the fact that in it heaven and earth are not in communication with each other, and all things in consequence do not have free course; and that the high and the low (superiors and inferiors) are not in communication with one another, and there are no (well-regulated) states under the sky. The inner (trigram) is made up of the weak and divided lines, and the outer of the strong and undivided: the inner is (the symbol of) weakness, and the outer of strength; the inner (represents) the small man, and the outer the superior man. Thus the way of the small man appears increasing, and that of the superior man decreasing.
tuan.modern_ja: 天と地が交わらず、万物が通じ合わない時期です。内に弱さ、外に強さがあり、バランスが崩れています。この時期は堅実に守りを固めることが重要です。

xiang.classic: 天地不交，否；君子以儉德辟難，不可榮以祿。
xiang.modern: (The trigrams of) heaven and earth, not in intercommunication, form Pi. The superior man, in accordance with this, restrains (the manifestation) of) his virtue, and avoids the calamities (that threaten him). There is no opportunity of conferring on him the glory of emolument.
xiang.modern_ja: 天地が通じ合わない時期です。徳を内に秘め、難を避けることが賢明です。自分らしさを大切にしながら、道を切り開いていけます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：拔茅茹，以其彙，貞吉亨。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, suggests the idea of grass pulled up, and bringing with it other stalks with whose roots it is connected. With firm correctness (on the part of its subject), there will be good fortune and progress.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune through firm goodness, (suggested by) the pulling up of the grass,' arises from the will (of the parties intended) being bent on (serving) the ruler.
xiang.modern_ja: 志が上の人に向いていることで、吉が生まれます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

1.modern_ja: 仲間と共に正しい道を守ることで、吉が生まれます。志を同じくする人と協力することが大切です。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：包承。小人吉，大人否，亨。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject patient and obedient. To the small man (comporting himself so) there will be good fortune. If the great man (comport himself) as the distress and obstruction require, he will have success.

xiang.modern: 'The great man, comporting himself as the distress and obstruction require, will have success: - 'he does not allow himself to be disordered by the herd (of small men).
xiang.modern_ja: 混乱に巻き込まれないことが大切です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 忍耐強く待つことで、良い結果につながります。小さな人は順応し、大きな人は困難に向き合うことで道が開けます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：包羞。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject ashamed of the purpose folded (in his breast).

xiang.modern: That 'his shame is folded in his breast' is owing to the inappropriateness of his position.
xiang.modern_ja: 位置が適切でないことによる困難です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.modern_ja: 恥ずかしい状況にあるかもしれませんが、今は耐える時期です。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject acting in accordance with the ordination (of Heaven), and committing no error. His companions will come and share in his happiness.

xiang.modern: 'He acts in accordance with the ordination (of Heaven), and commits no error:' - the purpose of his mind can be carried into effect.
xiang.modern_ja: 志を実行できる時期です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

4.modern_ja: 天の命に従って動くことで、問題は避けられます。仲間と共に幸せを分かち合える時期が来ます。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：休否，大人吉。其亡其亡，繫于苞桑。
5.modern: In the fifth NINE, undivided, we see him who brings the distress and obstruction to a close,--the great man and fortunate. (But let him say), 'We may perish! We may perish!' (so shall the state of things become firm, as if) bound to a clump of bushy mulberry trees.

xiang.modern: The good fortune of the great man' arises from the correctness of his position.
xiang.modern_ja: 正しい位置にいることで、大きな吉が生まれます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.modern_ja: 停滞を終わらせる力がある時期です。油断せず、常に危機感を持つことで、安定した状態を維持できます。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：傾否，先否後喜。
6.modern: The sixth NINE, undivided, shows the overthrow (and removal of) the condition of distress and obstruction. Before this there was that condition. Hereafter there will be joy.

xiang.modern: 'The distress and obstruction having reached its end, it is overthrown and removed:' - how could it be prolonged?
xiang.modern_ja: 停滞は永遠に続くものではありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

6.modern_ja: 停滞が終わり、喜びが訪れる時期です。最初は困難でも、後には良い結果が待っています。

judgment.classic: 同人于野，亨。利涉大川，利君子貞。
judgment.modern: Tong Ren (or 'Union of men') appears here (as we find it) in the (remote districts of the) country, indicating progress and success. It will be advantageous to cross the great stream. It will be advantageous to maintain the firm correctness of the superior man.
judgment.modern_ja: 人と心を合わせることが大切な時期です。広い視野で人と結びつくことで、大きな成果が期待できます。正しい道を歩むことで、困難も乗り越えられます。

tuan.classic: 同人，柔得位得中，而應乎乾，曰同人。同人曰，同人于野，亨。利涉大川，乾行也。文明以健，中正而應，君子正也。唯君子為能通天下之志。
tuan.modern: In Tong Ren the weak (line) has the place (of influence), the central place, and responds to (the corresponding line in) Qian (above); hence comes its name of Tong Ren (or 'Union of men'). Tong Ren says: - The language, 'Tong Ren appears here (as we find it) in (the remote districts of) the country, indicating progress and success, and that it will be advantageous to cross the great stream,' is moulded by its containing the strength (symbolled) in Qian. (Then) we have (the trigram indicating) elegance and intelligence, supported by (that indicating) strength; with the line in the central, and its correct, position, and responding (to the corresponding line above): - (all representing) the correct course of the superior man. It is only the superior man who can comprehend and affect the minds of all under the sky.
tuan.modern_ja: 柔らかさが中心にあり、強さに応じています。文明と強さ、そして中正さを持っているからこそ、人と心を合わせられます。

xiang.classic: 天與火，同人；君子以類族辨物。
xiang.modern: (The trigrams for) heaven and fire form Tong Ren. The superior man, in accordance with this), distinguishes things according to their kinds and classes.
xiang.modern_ja: 天と火が共にある形です。それぞれの違いを認め、適材適所で物事を進めることが大切です。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：同人于門，无咎。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, (shows the representative of) the union of men just issuing from his gate. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: '(The representative of) the union of men is just issuing from his gate:' - who will blame him?
xiang.modern_ja: 門を出て人と結びつくことを、誰が咎めるでしょうか。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

1.modern_ja: 門を出て人と結びつくことで、問題は生じません。開かれた姿勢で人と接することが吉です。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：同人于宗，吝。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, (shows the representative of) the union of men in relation with his kindred. There will be occasion for regret.

xiang.modern: '(The representative of) the union of men appears in relation with his kindred:' - that is the path to regret.
xiang.modern_ja: 身内だけで結びつくと、後悔の道につながります。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

2.modern_ja: 身内だけで固まると、後々問題が生じやすいです。より広い視野で人と結びつくことが大切です。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：伏戎于莽，升其高陵，三歲不興。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, (shows its subject) with his arms hidden in the thick grass, and at the top of a high mound. (But) for three years he makes no demonstration.

xiang.classic: 伏戎于莽，敵剛也。三歲不興，安行也。
xiang.modern: 'He hides his arms in the thick grass:' - because of the strength of his opponent. 'For three years he makes no demonstration:' - how can he do anything?
xiang.modern_ja: 相手が強いため、しばらく動かないことが賢明です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: 警戒して動きを控える時期です。相手が強い場合は、長い間待つことも必要です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, (shows its subject) mounted on the city wall; but he does not proceed to make the attack (he contemplates). There will be good fortune.

xiang.classic: 乘其墉，義弗克也，其吉，則困而反則也。
xiang.modern: 'He is mounted on his city-wall;' but yielding to the right, 'he does not proceed to make the attack (he contemplated).' (Where it is said),'There will be good fortune,' (that shows how) he feels the strait he is in, and returns to the rule of law.
xiang.modern_ja: 困難にあっても正しい道に戻ることが大切です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

4.modern_ja: 攻撃する準備はあっても、実行しないことが吉です。困難な状況でも、正しい道に戻ることで良い結果につながります。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：同人，先號咷而後笑。大師克相遇。
5.modern: In the fifth NINE, undivided, (the representative of) the union of men first wails and cries out, and then laughs. His great host conquers, and he (and the subject of the second line) meet together.

xiang.classic: 同人之先，以中直也。大師相遇，言相克也。
xiang.modern: The first action of (the representative of) the union of men (here described) arises from his central position and straightforward character. 'The meeting secured by his great host' intimates that the opponents of it have been overcome.
xiang.modern_ja: 中心にいて正直であることが力になります。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.modern_ja: 最初は苦しくても、最後には笑いがあります。大きな力で困難を乗り越え、仲間と再会できます。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：同人于郊，无悔。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, (shows the representative of) the union of men in the suburbs. There will be no occasion for repentance.

xiang.modern: '(The representative of) the union of men appears in the suburbs:' - his object has not yet been attained.
xiang.modern_ja: 志がまだ完全には実現していません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

6.modern_ja: 郊外で人と結びつく段階です。後悔はありませんが、まだ目標は完全には達成されていません。

judgment.classic: 大有：元亨。
judgment.modern: Da You indicates that, (under the circumstances which it implies), there will be great progress and success.
judgment.modern_ja: 大きな成果を得られる時期です。多くのものを持ち、それを活かせる位置にいます。順調に物事が進む流れにあります。

tuan.classic: 大有，柔得尊位，大中而上下應之，曰大有。其德剛健而文明，應乎天而時行，是以元亨。
tuan.modern: In Da You the weak (line) has the place of honour, is grandly central, and (the strong lines) above and below respond to it. Hence comes its name of Da You (Having what is Great). The attributes (of its component trigrams) are strength and vigour with elegance and brightness. (The ruling line in it) responds to (the ruling line in the symbol of) heaven, and (consequently) its action is (all) at the proper times. In this way (it is said to) indicate great progress and success.
tuan.modern_ja: 柔らかさが中心の高い位置にあり、上下がそれに応じています。強さと文明さを持ち、天に応じて時に従って動くことで、大きな成功が得られます。

xiang.classic: 火在天上，大有；君子以遏惡揚善，順天休命。
xiang.modern: (The trigram for) heaven and (that of) fire above it form Da You. The superior man, in accordance with this, represses what is evil and gives distinction to what is good, in sympathy with the excellent Heaven-conferred (nature).
xiang.modern_ja: 火が天の上にある形です。悪を抑え、善を広めることで、天の恵みに応えることができます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：无交害，匪咎，艱則无咎。
1.modern: In the first NINE, undivided, there is no approach to what is injurious, and there is no error. Let there be a realisation of the difficulty (and danger of the position), and there will be no error (to the end).

xiang.modern: This first NINE, (undivided), of Da You shows no approach to what is injurious.
xiang.modern_ja: 害のあることに近づかないことが大切です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 問題を引き起こさないように、困難を意識しながら進むことで、過ちを避けられます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：大車以載，有攸往，无咎。
2.modern: In the second NINE, undivided, we have a large waggon with its load. In whatever direction advance is made, there will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'A large waggon with its load' refers to the (virtue) accumulated (in the subject of the line), so that he will suffer no loss (in the conduct of affairs).
xiang.modern_ja: 中心に蓄えがあることで、失敗を避けられます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

2.modern_ja: 大きな荷物を運べる力があります。どの方向に進んでも問題ありません。蓄えた力で失敗を避けられます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：公用亨于天子，小人弗克。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows us a feudal prince presenting his offerings to the Son of Heaven. A small man would be unequal (to such a duty).

xiang.classic: 公用亨于天子，小人害也。
xiang.modern: 'A feudal prince presents his offerings to the son of Heaven:' - a small man (in such a position) does (himself) harm.
xiang.modern_ja: 高い地位に仕えることは、小さな器では難しいです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.modern_ja: 高い地位の人に仕えることができる時期です。ただし、謙虚さを忘れると問題が生じます。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject keeping his great resources under restraint. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He keeps his great resources under restraint:' - his wisdom discriminates clearly (what he ought to do).
xiang.modern_ja: 控えめにすることで、明確な判断ができます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

4.modern_ja: 持っている力を誇示せず、控えめにすることで問題を避けられます。賢明な判断ができる時期です。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：厥孚交如，威如；吉。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows the sincerity of its subject reciprocated by that of all the others (represented in the hexagram). Let him display a proper majesty, and there will be good fortune.

xiang.classic: 厥孚交如，信以發志也。威如之吉，易而无備也。
xiang.modern: 'His sincerity is reciprocated by all the others:' - his sincerity serves to stir and call out what is in their minds. 'The good fortune springing from a display of proper majesty' shows how they might (otherwise) feel too easy, and make no preparation (to serve him).
xiang.modern_ja: 誠実さが志を呼び起こします。威厳があれば準備を怠りません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.modern_ja: 誠実さが周囲に伝わり、威厳も備わる時期です。信頼関係を築くことで、良い結果につながります。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：自天祐之，吉无不利。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject with help accorded to him from Heaven. There will be good fortune, advantage in every respect.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune attached to the topmost line of Da You' arises from the help of Heaven.
xiang.modern_ja: 天からの助けによって、大きな吉が生まれます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

6.modern_ja: 天からの助けがある時期です。全ての面で有利に物事が進みます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

judgment.classic: 謙：亨，君子有終。
judgment.modern: Qian indicates progress and success. The superior man, (being humble as it implies), will have a (good) issue (to his undertakings).
judgment.modern_ja: 謙虚さが成功への鍵となる時期です。控えめな姿勢を保つことで、物事が順調に進み、良い結果を得られます。

tuan.classic: 謙，亨，天道下濟而光明，地道卑而上行。天道虧盈而益謙，地道變盈而流謙，鬼神害盈而福謙，人道惡盈而好謙。謙尊而光，卑而不可踰，君子之終也。
tuan.modern: Qian indicates progress and success. It is the way of heaven to send down its beneficial influences below, where they are brilliantly displayed. It is the way of earth, lying low, to send its influences upwards and (there) to act. It is the way of heaven to diminish the full and augment the humble. It is the way of earth to overthrow the full and replenish the humble. Spiritual Beings inflict calamity on the full and bless the humble. It is the way of men to hate the full and love the humble. Humility in a position of honour makes that still more brilliant; and in a low position men will not (seek to) pass beyond it. Thus it is that 'the superior man will have a (good) issue (to his undertakings).'
tuan.modern_ja: 天は高いものを減らし、低いものを増やします。地は高いところから低いところへ流します。謙虚さは人に好まれ、栄光をもたらします。

xiang.classic: 地中有山，謙；君子以裒多益寡，稱物平施。
xiang.modern: (The trigram for) the earth and (that of) a mountain in the midst of it form Qian. The superior man, in accordance with this, diminishes what is excessive (in himself), and increases where there is any defect, bringing about an equality, according to the nature of the case, in his treatment (of himself and others).
xiang.modern_ja: 地の中に山がある形です。多いところから少ないところへ分け与え、バランスを取ることが大切です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：謙謙君子，用涉大川，吉。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows us the superior man who adds humility to humility. (Even) the great stream may be crossed with this, and there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The superior man who adds humility to humility' is one who nourishes his (virtue) in lowliness.
xiang.modern_ja: 謙虚に自分を養うことが大切です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 謙虚さに謙虚さを重ねることで、どんな困難も乗り越えられます。自分を低く保つことで、徳を養えます。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：鳴謙，貞吉。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows us humility that has made itself recognised. With firm correctness there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune consequent on being firm and correct, where the humility has made itself recognised, is owing to the possessor's having (the virtue) in the core of his heart.
xiang.modern_ja: 心の中に謙虚さがあることで、良い結果が生まれます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 謙虚さが周囲に認められる時期です。正しい道を守ることで、吉が生まれます。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：勞謙，君子有終，吉。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows the superior man of (acknowledged) merit. He will maintain his success to the end, and have good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The superior man of (acknowledged) merit, and yet humble:' - the myriads of the people will submit to him.
xiang.modern_ja: 功績がありながら謙虚であれば、多くの人が従います。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: 功績がありながらも謙虚な人は、最後まで良い結果を得られます。多くの人がついてきます。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows one, whose action would be in every way advantageous, stirring up (the more) his humility.

xiang.modern: 'One, whose action would be in every way advantageous, stirs up his humility the more:'(but in doing so) he does not act contrary to the (proper) rule.
xiang.modern_ja: 謙虚さを発揮することは、道理に合っています。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

4.modern_ja: あらゆることが有利に進みます。謙虚さをさらに発揮することで、道理に反しません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：不富，以其鄰，利用侵伐，无不利。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows one who, without being rich, is able to employ his neighbours. He may advantageously use the force of arms. All his movements will be advantageous.

xiang.modern: 'He may advantageously use the force of arms:' - correcting, that is, those who do not submit.
xiang.modern_ja: 服従しない者を正すことができます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.modern_ja: 財力がなくても、謙虚さで周囲の協力を得られます。必要であれば行動を起こすことも可能です。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：鳴謙，利用行師，征邑國。
6.modern: The sixth SIX, divided, shows us humility that has made itself recognised. The subject of it will with advantage put his hosts in motion; but (he will only) punish his own towns and state.

xiang.classic: 鳴謙，志未得也。可用行師，征邑國也。
xiang.modern: 'His humility has made itself recognised:' - (but) all his aims have not yet been attained. He may employ the force of arms, (but only) in correcting (his own) towns and state.'
xiang.modern_ja: 志がまだ完全には達成されていませんが、行動で解決できます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.modern_ja: 謙虚さが周囲に知れ渡っています。行動を起こすことで、身近な問題を解決できます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

judgment.classic: 豫：利建侯，行師。
judgment.modern: Yu indicates that, (in the state which it implies), feudal princes may be set up, and the hosts put in motion, with advantage.
judgment.modern_ja: 喜びと調和が満ちる時期です。リーダーを立て、行動を起こすことが有利です。時宜を得た動きが成功につながります。

tuan.classic: 豫，剛應而志行，順以動，豫。豫，順以動，故天地如之，而況建侯行師乎？天地以順動，故日月不過，而四時不忒；聖人以順動，則刑罰清而民服。豫之時義大矣哉！
tuan.modern: In Yu we see the strong (line) responded to by all the others, and the will (of him whom it represents) being carried out; and (also) docile obedience employing movement (for its purposes). (From these things comes) Yu (the Condition of harmony and satisfaction). In this condition we have docile obedience employing movement (for its purposes), and therefore it is so as between heaven and earth; - how much more will it be so (among men) in 'the setting up of feudal princes and putting the hosts in motion!' Heaven and earth show that docile obedience in connexion with movement, and hence the sun and moon make no error (in time), and the four seasons do not deviate (from their order). The sages show such docile obedience in connexion with their movements, and hence their punishments and penalties are entirely just, and the people acknowledge it by their submission. Great indeed are the time and significance indicated in Yu!
tuan.modern_ja: 強さが応じられ、志が実行される時期です。順序立てて動くことで、天地も従い、万物が育ちます。

xiang.classic: 雷出地奮，豫。先王以作樂崇德，殷薦之上帝，以配祖考。
xiang.modern: (The trigrams for) the earth and thunder issuing from it with its crashing noise form Yu. The ancient kings, in accordance with this, composed their music and did honour to virtue, presenting it especially and most grandly to God, when they associated with Him (at the service) their highest ancestor and their father.
xiang.modern_ja: 雷が地から出る形です。先人たちは音楽を作り、徳を讃えました。調和を大切にする時期です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：鳴豫，凶。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject proclaiming his pleasure and satisfaction. There will be evil.

xiang.modern: 'The (subject of the) first six proclaims his pleasure and satisfaction:' - there will be evil; his wishes have been satisfied to overflowing.
xiang.modern_ja: 志が行き過ぎると、凶になります。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

1.modern_ja: 喜びを大げさに表現すると、問題が生じます。控えめにすることが吉です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：介于石，不終日，貞吉。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows one who is firm as a rock. (He sees a thing) without waiting till it has come to pass; with his firm correctness there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: '(He sees a thing) without waiting till it has come to pass; with his firm correctness there will be good fortune:' - this is shown by the central and correct position (of the line).
xiang.modern_ja: 中正であることで、吉が生まれます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

2.modern_ja: 岩のように堅実で、事が起こる前に察知できる人は吉です。中正であることで、良い結果が生まれます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：盱豫，悔。遲有悔。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows one looking up (for favours), while he indulges the feeling of pleasure and satisfaction. If he would understand!--If he be late in doing so, there will indeed be occasion for repentance.

xiang.modern: 'He looks up (for favours), while he indulges the feeling of satisfaction; there will be occasion for repentance:' - this is intimated by the position not being the appropriate one.
xiang.modern_ja: 位置が適切でないことによる問題です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.modern_ja: 上を見上げて喜びを求めると、後悔することになります。早めに気づくことが大切です。

4.label: 九四
4.classic: 九四：由豫，大有得。勿疑。朋盍簪。
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows him from whom the harmony and satisfaction come. Great is the success which he obtains. Let him not allow suspicions to enter his mind, and thus friends will gather around him.

xiang.modern: 'From him the harmony and satisfaction come; great is the success which he obtains:' - his aims take effect on a grand scale.
xiang.modern_ja: 志が大きく実現する時期です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。
