xiang.modern_ja: 垣根が開くのは、まだ問題がないからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

4.modern_ja: 堅実で吉、後悔が消えます。垣根が開いて角を絡ませず、大きな車の軸受けのように強さがあります。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：喪羊于易，无悔。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows one who loses his ram(-like strength) in the ease of his position. (But) there will be no occasion for repentance.

xiang.modern: 'He loses his ram and hardly perceives it:' - he is not in his appropriate place.
xiang.modern_ja: 羊を失っても、位置が正しくないだけです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

5.modern_ja: 羊を易々と失うように、執着がありません。後悔はありません。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：羝羊觸藩，不能退，不能遂，无攸利，艱則吉。
6.modern: The sixth SIX, divided, shows (one who may be compared to) the ram butting against the fence, and unable either to retreat, or to advance as he would fain do. There will not be advantage in any respect; but if he realise the difficulty (of his position), there will be good fortune.

xiang.classic: 不能退，不能遂，不祥也。艱則吉，咎不長也。
xiang.modern: 'He is unable either to retreat or to advance:' - this is owing to his want of care. 'If he realise the difficulty (of his position), there will be good fortune:' - his error will not be prolonged.
xiang.modern_ja: 進むことも退くこともできないのは、詳しく考えていないからです。困難が吉に変わるのは、過ちが長続きしないからです。

6.modern_ja: 羊が垣根に突っ込んで、進むことも退くこともできません。利することはありませんが、困難が吉に変わることがあります。

judgment.classic: 晉：康侯用錫馬蕃庶，晝日三接。
judgment.modern: In Jin we see a prince who secures the tranquillity (of the people) presented on that account with numerous horses (by the king), and three times in a day received at interviews.
judgment.modern_ja: 進んで栄える時期です。柔順さが報われ、多くの恩恵を受けて、大きく活躍できます。今の流れを活かして、前に進んでいくことができます。

tuan.classic: 晉，進也。明出地上，順而麗乎大明，柔進而上行。是以康侯用錫馬蕃庶，晝日三接也。
tuan.modern: Jin denotes advancing. (In Jin we have) the bright (sun) appearing above the earth; (the symbol of) docile submission cleaving to that of the Great brightness; and the weak line advanced and moving above: - all these things give us the idea of 'a prince who secures the tranquillity (of the people), presented on that account with numerous horses (by the king), and three times in a day received at interviews.'
tuan.modern_ja: 晋とは進むことです。明るいものが地の上に出て、順に大いなる明るさに付き従います。柔順なものが上っていくことで、進み栄えます。

xiang.classic: 明出地上，晉；君子以自昭明德。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) the earth and that for the bright (sun) coming forth above it form Jin. The superior man, according to this, gives himself to make more brilliant his bright virtue.
xiang.modern_ja: 明るい太陽が地上に出る形です。自らを明らかにして徳を照らすことが大切です。この時期を活かすことで、成長につながります。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：晉如，摧如，貞吉。罔孚，裕无咎。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows one wishing to advance, and (at the same time) kept back. Let him be firm and correct, and there will be good fortune. If trust be not reposed in him, let him maintain a large and generous mind, and there will be no error.

xiang.classic: 晉如，摧如；獨行正也。裕无咎；未受命也。
xiang.modern: 'He appears wishing to advance, but (at the same time) being kept back:' - all-alone he pursues the correct course. 'Let him maintain a large and generous mind, and there will be no error:' - he has not yet received an official charge.
xiang.modern_ja: 押し戻されてもゆったり構えることが、まだ命を受けていないからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

1.modern_ja: 進もうとしても押し戻される状態ですが、堅実であれば吉です。信用されなくても、ゆったり構えれば問題ありません。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：晉如，愁如，貞吉。受茲介福，于其王母。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject with the appearance of advancing, and yet of being sorrowful. If he be firm and correct, there will be good fortune. He will receive this great blessing from his grandmother.

xiang.modern: 'He will receive this great blessing:' - for he is in the central place and the correct position for him.
xiang.modern_ja: 大きな福を受けるのは、中正だからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

2.modern_ja: 進んでも憂いがあります。堅実であれば吉で、王母から大きな福を受けられます。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：眾允，悔亡。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject trusted by all (around him). All occasion for repentance will disappear.

xiang.modern: 'All (around) trust him:' - their (common) aim is to move upwards and act.
xiang.modern_ja: 衆人の同意で、志が上に向かっています。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

3.modern_ja: 衆人の同意を得て、後悔が消えます。皆が進むことを認めています。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject with the appearance of advancing, but like a marmot. However firm and correct he may be, the position is one of peril.

xiang.modern: '(He advances like) a marmot. However firm and correct he may be, his position is one of peril:' - his place is not that appropriate for him.
xiang.modern_ja: 位置が正しくないからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: ハムスターのように進んでも、堅実には危険があります。位置が正しくありません。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：悔亡，失得勿恤，往吉，无不利。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows how all occasion for repentance disappears (from its subject). (But) let him not concern himself about whether he shall fail or succeed. To advance will be fortunate, and in every way advantageous.

xiang.modern: 'Let him not concern himself whether he fails or succeeds:' - his movement in advance will afford ground for congratulation.
xiang.modern_ja: 得失を気にしなければ、進んで慶びがあります。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

5.modern_ja: 後悔が消えます。得失を気にする必要はありません。進めば吉で、何をしても有利です。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：晉其角，維用伐邑，厲吉无咎，貞吝。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows one advancing his horns. But he only uses them to punish the (rebellious people of his own) city. The position is perilous, but there will be good fortune. (Yet) however firm and correct he may be, there will be occasion for regret.

xiang.modern: 'He uses his horns only to punish (the rebellious people of) his city:' - his course of procedure is not yet brilliant.
xiang.modern_ja: 敵を征伐することで正しさを得ますが、道がまだ光っていません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

6.modern_ja: 角を使って進むのは、敵を征伐する時だけにします。危険ですが吉となり、問題ありません。ただし、堅実であっても恥をかくことがあります。

judgment.classic: 明夷：利艱貞。
judgment.modern: Ming Yi indicates that (in the circumstances which it denotes) it will be advantageous to realise the difficulty (of the position), and maintain firm correctness.
judgment.modern_ja: 明るさが傷つけられる時期です。困難な中でも堅実さを守ることで、利があります。この時期を活かすことで、成長につながります。

tuan.classic: 明入地中，明夷。內文明而外柔順，以蒙大難，文王以之。利艱貞，晦其明也，內難而能正其志，箕子以之。
tuan.modern: (The symbol of) the Earth and that of Brightness entering into the midst of it give the idea of Ming Yi (Brightness wounded or obscured). The inner (trigram) denotes being accomplished and bright; the outer, being pliant and submissive. The case of king Wen was that of one who with these qualities was yet involved in great difficulties. 'It will be advantageous to realise the difficulty (of the position), and maintain firm correctness: - that is, (the individual concerned) should obscure his brightness. The case of the count of K? was that of one who, amidst the difficulties of his House, was able (thus) to maintain his aim and mind correct.
tuan.modern_ja: 明るいものが地中に入る形です。内に明るさを持ちながら外は従順に、大難を経験しても文王のように正しさを守ります。困難な中でも志を正すことが有利です。

xiang.classic: 明入地中，明夷；君子以蒞眾，用晦而明。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) the earth and that for the bright (sun) entering within it form Ming Yi. The superior man, in accordance with this, conducts his management of men; - he shows his intelligence by keeping it obscured.
xiang.modern_ja: 明るいものが地中に入る形です。民に接する時は、明るさを隠して暗くすることで身を守れます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：明夷于飛，垂其翼。君子于行，三日不食，有攸往，主人有言。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject, (in the condition indicated by) Ming Yi, flying, but with drooping wings. When the superior man (is revolving) his going away, he may be for three days without eating. Wherever he goes, the people there may speak (derisively of him).

xiang.modern: 'The superior man (is revolving his) going away:' - (in such a case) he feels it right not to eat.
xiang.modern_ja: 賢い人の旅では、義として食べないこともあります。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

1.modern_ja: 飛んでいるものが翼を垂れる状態です。賢い人は旅の途中で三日食べなくても、行くべき所には主人が言うことがあります。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：明夷，夷于左股，用拯馬壯，吉。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject, (in the condition indicated by) Ming Yi, wounded in the left thigh. He saves himself by the strength of a (swift) horse; and is fortunate.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune of (the subject of) the second SIX, divided,' is due to the proper fashion of his acting according to his circumstances.
xiang.modern_ja: 馬の力で幸運です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.modern_ja: 左ももを傷つけられますが、馬の力で救われ、吉です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：明夷于南狩，得其大首，不可疾貞。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject, (in the condition indicated by) Ming Yi, hunting in the south, and taking the great chief (of the darkness). He should not be eager to make (all) correct (at once).

xiang.modern: With the aim represented by 'hunting in the south' a great achievement is accomplished.
xiang.modern_ja: 南を狩る志は大きな獲物を得ることです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: 南を狩って大きな首領を得ますが、急いで正すことはできません。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：入于左腹，獲明夷之心，出于門庭。
4.modern: The fourth six, divided, shows its subject (just) entered into the left side of the belly (of the dark land). (But) he is able to carry out the mind appropriate (in the condition indicated by) Ming Yi, quitting the gate and courtyard (of the lord of darkness).

xiang.modern: 'He has (just) entered into the left side of the belly (of the dark land):' - he is still able to carry out the idea in his (inner) mind.
xiang.modern_ja: 門や庭を出て、志を得ます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

4.modern_ja: 左の腹を突き、明るさが傷つく心を得て、門や庭を出ます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：箕子之明夷，利貞。
5.modern: The fifth six, divided, shows how the count of K? fulfilled the condition indicated by Ming Yi. It will be advantageous to be firm and correct.

xiang.modern: 'With the firm correctness of the count of K?,' his brightness could not be (quite) extinguished.
xiang.modern_ja: 箕子の堅実さは、明るさを消すことができないからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.modern_ja: 箕子のように、堅実さが有利です。明るさを消すことはできません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：不明晦，初登于天，後入于地。
6.modern: The sixth six, divided, shows the case where there is no light, but (only) obscurity. (Its subject) had at first ascended to (the top of) the sky; his future shall be to go into the earth.

xiang.classic: 初登于天，照四國也。後入于地，失則也。
xiang.modern: 'He had at first ascended to (the top of) the sky:' - he might have enlightened the four quarters of the kingdom. 'His future shall be to go into the earth:' - he has failed to fulfil the model (of a ruler).
xiang.modern_ja: 最初は天に昇りますが、四国を照らします。後には地に入り、規則を失います。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.modern_ja: 明るくないから暗いのです。最初は天に昇っても、後には地に入ります。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

judgment.classic: 家人：利女貞。
judgment.modern: For (the realisation of what is taught in) Jia Ren, (or for the regulation of the family), what is most advantageous is that the wife be firm and correct.
judgment.modern_ja: 家庭と関係を整える時期です。女性の堅実さが特に有利です。内から始めて外に広げることが大切です。

tuan.classic: 家人，女正位乎內，男正位乎外，男女正，天地之大義也。家人有嚴君焉，父母之謂也。父父，子子，兄兄，弟弟，夫夫，婦婦，而家道正；正家而天下定矣。
tuan.modern: In Jia Ren the wife has her correct place in the inner (trigram), and the man his correct place in the outer. That man and woman occupy their correct places is the great righteousness shown (in the relation and positions of) heaven and earth. In Jia Ren we have the idea of an authoritative ruler; - that, namely, represented by the parental authority. Let the father be indeed father, and the son son; let the elder brother be indeed elder brother, and the younger brother younger brother, let the husband be indeed husband, and the wife wife: - then will the family be in its normal state. Bring the family to that state, and all under heaven will be established.
tuan.modern_ja: 女性は内で、男性は外でそれぞれの役割を果たします。父母がしっかりと家を導き、各々が自分らしくあれば、家庭は安定し、天下も平和になります。

xiang.classic: 風自火出，家人；君子以言有物，而行有恆。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) fire, and that for wind coming forth from it, form Jia Ren. The superior man, in accordance with this, orders his words according to (the truth of) things, and his conduct so that it is uniformly consistent.
xiang.modern_ja: 風が火から出る形です。言葉に実があり、行いに恒久性があることが大切です。今の流れを活かして、前に進んでいくことができます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：閑有家，悔亡。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject establishing restrictive regulations in his household Occasion for repentance will disappear.

xiang.modern: 'He establishes restrictive regulations in his household: - (he does so), before any change has taken place in their wills.
xiang.modern_ja: 志が変わらないうちに規則を作ります。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

1.modern_ja: 家に規則を設けることで、後悔を避けられます。志が変わらないうちに規則を作ることが大切です。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：无攸遂，在中饋，貞吉。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject taking nothing on herself, but in her central place attending to the preparation of the food. Through her firm correctness there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune attached to the second six, (divided),' is due to the docility (of its subject), operating with humility.
xiang.modern_ja: 柔順で中にあることで、吉です。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.modern_ja: 従うべきことがなく、中で食事を作る役割です。堅実で吉です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：家人嗃嗃，悔厲吉；婦子嘻嘻，終吝。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject (treating) the members of the household with stern severity. There will be occasion for repentance, there will be peril, (but) there will (also) be good fortune. If the wife and children were to be smirking and chattering, in the end there would be occasion for regret.

xiang.classic: 家人嗃嗃，未失也；婦子嘻嘻，失家節也。
xiang.modern: When 'the members of the household are treated with stern severity,' there has been no (great) failure (in the regulation of the family). When 'wife and children are smirking and chattering,' the (proper) economy of the family has been lost.
xiang.modern_ja: 家が厳しいと、失われていない状態です。女性や子供が笑い合うと、家は失われます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

3.modern_ja: 家の人が厳しく叱ると、後悔しても危険ですが吉です。女性や子供が笑い合うと、最終的には恥をかきます。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject enriching the family. There will be great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The family is enriched, and there is great good fortune:' - this is due to the docility (belonging to the subject of the line), and its being in its correct place.
xiang.modern_ja: 家を富ませて大吉なのは、位置に順っているからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

4.modern_ja: 家を富ませることで大吉です。順に位置にあることで、大吉が生まれます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：王假有家，勿恤，往吉。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the influence of the king extending to his family. There need be no anxiety; there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The influence of the king extends to his family:' - the intercourse between them is that of mutual love.
xiang.modern_ja: 愛を交わすことで吉が生まれます。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.modern_ja: 王が家を持つように、心配せずとも吉です。愛を交わすことで、吉が生まれます。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：有孚威如，終吉。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject possessed of sincerity and arrayed in majesty. In the end there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune connected with the display of majesty' describes (the result of) the recovery of the true character.
xiang.modern_ja: 威厳が吉をもたらすのは、自分を反省するからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

6.modern_ja: 誠意があり威厳があれば、最終的に吉です。自分を反省することで吉に向かいます。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

judgment.classic: 睽：小事吉。
judgment.modern: Kui indicates that, (notwithstanding the condition of things which it denotes), in small matters there will (still) be good success.
judgment.modern_ja: 対立や違いがある時期です。小さなことには吉があります。違いを認め合いながら調和を目指すことが大切です。

tuan.classic: 睽，火動而上，澤動而下；二女同居，其志不同行；說而麗乎明，柔進而上行，得中而應乎剛；是以小事吉。天地睽，而其事同也；男女睽，而其志通也；萬物睽，而其事類也；睽之時用大矣哉！
tuan.modern: In Kui we have (the symbol of) Fire, which, when moved, tends upwards, and that of a Marsh, whose waters, when moved, tend downwards. We have (also the symbols of) two sisters living together, but whose wills do not move in the same direction. (We see how the inner trigram expressive of) harmonious satisfaction is attached to (the outer expressive of) bright intelligence; (we see) the weak line advanced and acting above, and how it occupies the central place, and is responded to by the strong (line below). These indications show that 'in small matters there will (still) be good fortune.' Heaven and earth are separate and apart, but the work which they do is the same. Male and female are separate and apart, but with a common will they seek the same object. There is diversity between the myriad classes of beings, but there is an analogy between their several operations. Great indeed are the phenomena and the results of this condition of disunion and separation.
tuan.modern_ja: 火は上に動き、沢は下に動きます。二人の女が一緒にいても志が合いません。喜んで明るさに付くことで、柔らかいものが進み上って中を得ます。小事には吉です。天地が対しても事業は同じであり、男女が対しても志は通じ、万物が対しても事業は同類です。

xiang.classic: 上火下澤，睽；君子以同而異。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) fire above, and that for (the waters of) a marsh below, form Kui. The superior man, in accordance with this, where there is a general agreement, yet admits diversity.
xiang.modern_ja: 上に火、下に沢がある形です。同じでありながら違いもあることを認識することが大切です。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：悔亡，喪馬勿逐，自復；見惡人无咎。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows that (to its subject) occasion for repentance will disappear. He has lost his horses, but let him not seek for them - they will return of themselves. Should he meet with bad men, he will not err (in communicating with them).

xiang.modern: 'He meets with bad men (and communicates with them):' - (he does so), to avoid the evil of their condemnation.
xiang.modern_ja: 悪い人を見ることで過ちを避けられます。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 後悔が消えます。馬を失っても追わなければ戻ってきます。悪い人を見てもそれで過ちを避けられます。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：遇主于巷，无咎。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject happening to meet with his lord in a bye-passage. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He happens to meet with his lord in a bye-passage:' - but he has not deviated (for this meeting) from the (proper) course.
xiang.modern_ja: 路地で主人に出会っても、失礼ではありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.modern_ja: 路地で主人に出会います。問題ありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：見輿曳，其牛掣，其人天且劓，无初有終。
3.modern: In the third SIX, divided, we see one whose carriage is dragged back, while the oxen in it are pushed back, and he is himself subjected to the shaving of his head and the cutting off of his nose. There is no good beginning, but there will be a good end.

xiang.classic: 見輿曳，位不當也。无初有終，遇剛也。
xiang.modern: 'We see his carriage dragged back:' - this is indicated by the inappropriateness of the position (of the line). 'There is no (good) beginning, but there will be a (good) end:' - this arises from his meeting with the strong (subject of the topmost line).
xiang.modern_ja: 車を引かれるのは、位置が正しくないからです。終わりがあるのは、強いものに出会うからです。

3.modern_ja: 車を引かれ、牛を止められ、人は刺青され鼻を削がれます。始まりはありませんが、終わりがあります。

4.label: 九四
4.classic: 九四：睽孤，遇元夫，交孚，厲无咎。
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject solitary amidst the (prevailing) disunion. (But) he meets with the good man (represented by the first line), and they blend their sincere desires together. The position is one of peril, but there will be no mistake.

xiang.modern: 'They blend their sincere desires together, and there will be no error:' - their (common) aim is carried into effect.
xiang.modern_ja: 誠意を交わして問題ないのは、志が運ばれるからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: 対立して孤独ですが、元の男に出会って誠意を交わせば問題ありません。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：悔亡，厥宗噬膚，往何咎。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows that (to its subject) occasion for repentance will disappear. With his relative (and minister he unites closely and readily) as if he were biting through a piece of skin. When he goes forward (with this help), what error can there be?

xiang.modern: 'With his hereditary minister (he unites closely and easily) as if he were biting through a piece of skin:' - his going forward will afford ground for congratulation.
xiang.modern_ja: 宗族が膚を噛むのは、進んで喜びがあるからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.modern_ja: 後悔が消えます。宗族が膚を噛むように、進んでも何の問題もありません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：睽孤，見豕負塗，載鬼一車，先張之弧，後說之弧，匪寇婚媾，往遇雨則吉。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject solitary amidst the (prevailing) disunion. (In the subject of the third line, he seems to) see a pig bearing on its back a load of mud, (or fancies) there is a carriage full of ghosts. He first bends his bow against him, and afterwards unbends it, (for he discovers) that he is not an assailant to injure, but a near relative. Going forward, he shall meet with (genial) rain, and there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune symbolised by meeting with (genial) rain' springs from the passing away of all doubts.
xiang.modern_ja: 雨の吉は、衆の疑いが消えるからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

6.modern_ja: 対立して孤独で、豚が泥を背負い、車に鬼が満ちているように見えます。最初は弓を引きますが、後には弓を置きます。敵ではなく婚姻でした。進めば雨に会い、吉です。

judgment.classic: 蹇：利西南，不利東北；利見大人，貞吉。
judgment.modern: In (the state indicated by) Jian advantage will be found in the south-west, and the contrary in the north-east. It will be advantageous (also) to meet with the great man. (In these circumstances), with firmness and correctness, there will be good fortune.
judgment.modern_ja: 困難に直面する時期です。西南は有利ですが、東北は有利ではありません。偉大な人に会うことが有利で、堅実であれば吉です。

tuan.classic: 蹇，難也，險在前也。見險而能止，知矣哉！蹇利西南，往得中也；不利東北，其道窮也。利見大人，往有功也。當位貞吉，以正邦也。蹇之時用大矣哉！
tuan.modern: Jian denotes difficulty. There is (the trigram expressive of) perilousness in front. When one, seeing the peril, can arrest his steps (in accordance with the significance of the lower tri. gram), is he not wise? (The language of) Jian, that 'advantage will be found in the south-west,' refers to the (strong fifth line) advanced and in the central place. That 'there will be no advantage in the north-east,' intimates that the way (of dealing with the Jian state) is exhausted. That 'it will be advantageous to see the great man,' intimates that advance will lead to achievement. That the places (of the different lines after the first) are those appropriate to them indicates firm correctness and good fortune, with which the regions (of the kingdom) are brought to their normal state. Great indeed is the work to be done in the time of Jian!
tuan.modern_ja: 困難が目の前にあっても、止まって見極めることが知恵です。進めば中庸を得られ、道は開けます。時に適った行動が大切です。

xiang.classic: 山上有水，蹇；君子以反身修德。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) a mountain, and above it that for water, form Jian. The superior man, in accordance with this, turns round (and examines) himself, and cultivates his virtue.
xiang.modern_ja: 山に水がある形です。自分に反省して徳を修めることが大切です。自分らしさを大切にしながら、道を切り開いていけます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：往蹇，來譽。
1.modern: From the first SIX, divided, we learn that advance (on the part of its subject) will lead to (greater) difficulties, while remaining stationary will afford ground for praise.

xiang.modern: 'Advancing will conduct to (greater) difficulties, while remaining stationary will afford ground for praise:' - the proper course is to wait.
xiang.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば称賛は、待つ価値があるからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば称賛されます。まず待つことが正しいです。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：王臣蹇蹇，匪躬之故。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows the minister of the king struggling with difficulty on difficulty, and not with a view to his own advantage.

xiang.modern: 'The minister of the king struggles with difficulty on difficulty:' - in the end no blame will be attached to him.
xiang.modern_ja: 王の臣として困難に困難を重ねるのは、自分を傷つけることが最終的にはないからです。

2.modern_ja: 王の臣として困難に困難を重ねますが、自分のためではありません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：往蹇來反。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject advancing, (but only) to (greater) difficulties. He remains stationary, and returns (to his former associates).

xiang.modern: 'He advances, (but only) to (greater) difficulty; he remains stationary, and returns to his former associates:' - they, (represented in) the inner (trigram), rejoice in him.
xiang.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば内から喜ばれます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

3.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻って来ます。内から喜ばれます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject advancing, (but only) to (greater) difficulties. He remains stationary, and unites (with the subject of the line above).

xiang.modern: 'To advance will (only be to) encounter (greater) difficulties; he remains stationary, and unites (with the subject of the line above):' - that is in its proper place and has the solidity (due to it in that position).
xiang.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば連なるのは、位置が正しいからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば仲間と連なります。位置が正しいからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：大蹇朋來。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject struggling with the greatest difficulties, while friends are coming to help him.

xiang.modern: 'He struggles with the greatest difficulties, while friends are coming (to help him):' - he is in the central position, and possesses the requisite virtue.
xiang.modern_ja: 大いなる困難に友が来るのは、中正であることの報いです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

5.modern_ja: 大いなる困難に友が来ます。中正であることで、大徳の報いがあります。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：往蹇來碩，吉；利見大人。
6.modern: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject going forward, (only to increase) the difficulties, while his remaining stationary will be (productive of) great (merit). There will be good fortune, and it will be advantageous to meet with the great man.

xiang.classic: 往蹇來碩，志在內也。利見大人，以從貴也。
xiang.modern: 'To advance will (only) increase the difficulties, while his remaining stationary will (be productive of) great (merit):' - his aim is to assist the (subject of the line) inside of him. 'It will be advantageous to meet the great man:' - by his course he follows that noble (lord of the figure).
xiang.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば大いなる成果があるのは、志が内にあるからです。偉大な人に会うことが有利なのは、高貴な者に従うからです。

6.modern_ja: 進めば困難、戻れば大いなる成果があります。吉で、偉大な人に会うことが有利です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

judgment.classic: 解：利西南，无所往，其來復吉。有攸往，夙吉。
judgment.modern: In (the state indicated by) Jie advantage will be found in the south-west. If no (further) operations be called for, there will be good fortune in coming back (to the old conditions). If some operations be called for, there will be good fortune in the early conducting of them.
judgment.modern_ja: 困難から解放される時期です。西南が有利です。行くべき所がなければ元の場所に戻れば吉です。行くべき所があれば早く行けば吉です。

tuan.classic: 解，險以動，動而免乎險，解。解利西南，往得眾也。其來復吉，乃得中也。有攸往夙吉，往有功也。天地解，而雷雨作，雷雨作，而百果草木皆甲坼，解之時大矣哉！
tuan.modern: In Jie we have (the trigram expressive of) peril going on to that expressive of movement. By movement there is an escape from the peril: - (this is the meaning of) Jie. 'In (the state indicated by) Jie, advantage will be found in the south-west:' - the movement (thus) intimated will win all. That 'there will be good fortune in coming back (to the old conditions)' shows that such action is that of the due medium. That 'if some operations be necessary, there will be good fortune in the early conducting of them' shows that such operations will be successful. When heaven and earth are freed (from the grasp of winter), we have thunder and rain. When these come, the buds of the plants and trees that produce the various fruits begin to burst. Great indeed are the phenomena in the time intimated by Jie.
tuan.modern_ja: 困難から動き出して抜け出せる時期です。元に戻れば吉があり、行くべき所があれば早めに動くことで成果を得られます。

xiang.classic: 雷雨作，解；君子以赦過宥罪。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) thunder and that for rain, with these phenomena in a state of manifestation, form Jie. The superior man, in accordance with this, forgives errors, and deals gently with crimes.
xiang.modern_ja: 雷と雨が起こる形です。過ちを許し、罪を赦すことが大切です。この時期の意味を理解することで、より良い選択ができます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：无咎。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows that its subject will commit no error.

xiang.modern: The strong (fourth) line and the weak line here are in correlation: - we judge rightly in saying that 'its subject will commit no error.'
xiang.modern_ja: 剛と柔の交わりは、義に問題がありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

1.modern_ja: 問題ありません。休息が正しいです。剛と柔が交わり、義に問題ありません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：田獲三狐，得黃矢，貞吉。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject catch, in hunting, three foxes, and obtain the yellow (= golden) arrows. With firm correctness there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune springing from the firm correctness of the second NINE, (undivided),' is due to its subject holding the due mean.
xiang.modern_ja: 中正だから吉です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

2.modern_ja: 狩りで三匹の狐を得て黄金の矢を得ます。堅実で吉です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：負且乘，致寇至，貞吝。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows a porter with his burden, (yet) riding in a carriage. He will (only) tempt robbers to attack him. However firm and correct he may (try to) be, there will be cause for regret.

xiang.classic: 負且乘，亦可醜也，自我致戎，又誰咎也。
xiang.modern: For 'a porter with his burden to be riding in a carriage' is a thing to be ashamed of. 'It is he himself that tempts the robbers to come:' - on whom besides can we lay the blame? (See Appendix III, i, 48.)
xiang.modern_ja: 荷物を背負って車に乗るのは、自分自身が招くことです。誰を咎められるでしょうか。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.modern_ja: 荷物を背負って車に乗ると、盗賊を招きます。堅実でも恥をかきます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: (To the subject of) the fourth NINE, undivided, (it is said), 'Remove your toes. Friends will (then) come, between you and whom there will be mutual confidence.'

xiang.modern: 'Remove your toes:' - the places (of this line and of the third and first) are all inappropriate to them.
xiang.modern_ja: 親指を解くのは、まだ位置が適切でないからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: 親指を解くと、朋友が来て信頼されます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：君子維有解，吉；有孚于小人。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows (its subject), the superior man (= the ruler), executing his function of removing (whatever is injurious to the idea of the hexagram), in which case there will he good fortune, and confidence in him will be shown even by the small men.

xiang.modern: When 'the superior man executes his function of removing (whatever is injurious to the idea of the hexagram),' small men will of themselves retire.
xiang.modern_ja: 賢い人が解を持つのは、小人が退くからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

5.modern_ja: 賢い人だけが解を持っています。吉で、小人に信頼をもたらします。退く者があります。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：公用射隼于高墉之上，獲之，无不利。
6.modern: In the sixth SIX, divided, we see a feudal prince (with his bow) shooting at a falcon on the top of a high wall, and hitting it. (The effect of his action) will be in every way advantageous.

xiang.modern: 'A prince with his bow shoots a falcon:' - thus he removes (the promoters of) rebellion.
xiang.modern_ja: 公が鷹を射るのは、邪悪を取り除くためです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

6.modern_ja: 公が鷹を射って高い城壁の上で手に入れます。何も有利でないことはありません。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

judgment.classic: 損：有孚，元吉，无咎，可貞，利有攸往。曷之用，二簋可用享。
judgment.modern: In (what is denoted by) Sun, if there be sincerity (in him who employs it), there will be great good fortune:--freedom from error; firmness and correctness that can be maintained; and advantage in every movement that shall be made. In what shall this (sincerity in the exercise of Sun) be employed? (Even) in sacrifice two baskets of grain, (though there be nothing else), may be presented.
judgment.modern_ja: 減らすことで利がある時期です。誠意があれば大いなる吉で、問題はありません。堅実であれば、どの方向に動いても有利です。簡素な祭祀でも心がこもっていれば良いのです。

tuan.classic: 損，損下益上，其道上行。損而有孚，元吉，无咎，可貞，利有攸往。曷之用？二簋可用享；二簋應有時。損剛益柔有時，損益盈虛，與時偕行。
tuan.modern: In Sun (we see) the lower (trigram) diminished, and the upper added to. (But) the method (of action) implied in this operates also above (or, mounts upwards (also) and operates). 'If there be sincerity in this method of diminution, there will be great good fortune; freedom from error; firmness and correctness that can be maintained; and advantage in every movement that shall be made. In what shall this (sincerity in the exercise of Sun) be employed? (Even) in sacrifice, two baskets of grain, (though there be nothing else), may be presented:' - for these two baskets there ought to be the fitting time. There is a time when the strong should be diminished, and the weak should be strengthened. Diminution and increase, overflowing and emptiness: -these take place in harmony with the conditions of the time.
tuan.modern_ja: 下を減らして上を増やすのは、道が上に向かうことです。減らしても誠意があれば大いなる吉です。簡素であっても誠意が大切です。減と増、満と空は時と共に行われます。

xiang.classic: 山下有澤，損；君子以懲忿窒欲。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) a mountain and beneath it that for the waters of a marsh form Sun. The superior man, in accordance with this, restrains his wrath and represses his desires.
xiang.modern_ja: 山の下に沢がある形です。怒りを抑え、欲望を制することが大切です。自分らしさを大切にしながら、道を切り開いていけます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：巳事遄往，无咎，酌損之。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject suspending his own affairs, and hurrying away (to help the subject of the fourth line). He will commit no error, but let him consider how far he should contribute of what is his (for the other).

xiang.modern: 'He suspends his own affairs and hurries away (to help the subject of the fourth line):' - the (subject of that) upper (line) mingles his wishes with his.
xiang.modern_ja: 終えて早く行くのは、志を合わせるためです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

1.modern_ja: 自分の仕事を終えて早く動けば問題ありません。何を減らすか、何を残すかを見極めることが大切な時期です。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：利貞，征凶，弗損，益之。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows that it will be advantageous for its subject to maintain a firm correctness, and that action on his part will be evil. He can give increase (to his correlate) without taking from himself

xiang.modern: 'It will be advantageous for (the subject of) the second NINE, (undivided), to maintain his firm correctness:' - his central position gives its character to his aim.
xiang.modern_ja: 堅実で吉なのは、中で志すからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 堅実であれば吉、進めば凶です。減らさずに増やすことができます。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：三人行，則損一人；一人行，則得其友。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows how of three men walking together, the number is diminished by one; and how one, walking, finds his friend.

xiang.modern: 'One man, walking,' (finds his friend): - when three are together, doubts rise among them.
xiang.modern_ja: 一人で行けば、三人は疑います。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

3.modern_ja: 三人で行けば一人を減らし、一人で行けば友を得ます。調整が必要な時期です。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：損其疾，使遄有喜，无咎。
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject diminishing the ailment under which he labours by making (the subject of the first line) hasten (to his help), and make him glad. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He diminishes the ailment under which he labours:' - this is matter for joy.
xiang.modern_ja: 病を減らすことは、喜ぶべきことです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: 病を減らせば、早く喜びができて問題ありません。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：或益之，十朋之龜弗克違，元吉。
5.modern: The fifth SIX, divided, shows parties adding to (the stores of) its subject ten pairs of tortoise shells, and accepting no refusal. There will be great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The great good fortune attached to the fifth six, (divided),' is due to the blessing from above.
xiang.modern_ja: 大いなる吉は上からの祝福です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

5.modern_ja: 亀の甲羅で占っても止められないほどの増益があります。大いなる吉です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：弗損益之，无咎，貞吉，有攸往，得臣无家。
6.modern: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject giving increase to others without taking from himself. There will be no error. With firm correctness there will be good fortune. There will be advantage in every movement that shall be made. He will find ministers more than can be counted by their clans.

xiang.modern: 'He gives increase to others without taking from what is his own:' - he obtains his wish on a grand scale.
xiang.modern_ja: 減らさずに増やすのは、大きく志を得るからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

6.modern_ja: 減らさずに増やすと問題なく、堅実で吉です。どこに行っても有利で、臣下を得ますが家族はいません。

judgment.classic: 益：利有攸往，利涉大川。
judgment.modern: Yi indicates that (in the state which it denotes) there will be advantage in every movement which shall be undertaken, that it will be advantageous (even) to cross the great stream.
judgment.modern_ja: 増やすことが有利な時期です。大川を渡ることも有利です。どの方向に動いても利があります。

tuan.classic: 益，損上益下，民說无疆，自上下下，其道大光。利有攸往，中正有慶。利涉大川，木道乃行。益動而巽，日進无疆。天施地生，其益无方。凡益之道，與時偕行。
tuan.modern: In Yi we see the upper (trigram) diminished, and the lower added to. The satisfaction of the people (in consequence of this) is without limit. What descends from above reaches to all below, so great and brilliant is the course (of its operation). That 'there will be advantage in every movement which shall be undertaken' appears from the central and correct (positions of the second and fifth lines), and the (general) blessing (the dispensing of which they imply). That 'it will be advantageous (even) to cross the great stream' appears from the action of wood (shown in the figure). Yi is made up of (the trigrams expressive of) movement and docility, (through which) there is daily advancement to an unlimited extent. We have (also) in it heaven dispensing and earth producing, leading to an increase without restriction of place. Everything in the method of this increase proceeds according to the requirements of the time.
tuan.modern_ja: 上を減らして下を増やすことで、民の喜びは大きくなります。どこに行っても有利で、日々進歩し続けることができます。

xiang.classic: 風雷，益；君子以見善則遷，有過則改。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) wind and that for thunder form Yi. The superior man, in accordance with this, when he sees what is good, moves towards it; and when he sees his errors, he turns from them.
xiang.modern_ja: 風と雷が共にある形です。善を見れば移り、過ちがあれば改めることが大切です。今の流れを活かして、前に進んでいくことができます。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：利用為大作，元吉，无咎。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows that it will be advantageous for its subject in his position to make a great movement. If it be greatly fortunate, no blame will be imputed to him.

xiang.modern: 'If the movement be greatly fortunate, no blame will be imputed to him:' - though it is not for one in so low a position to have to do with great affairs.
xiang.modern_ja: 大いなる吉で問題ないのは、下が自分のためでないからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

1.modern_ja: 大きな作為をするのに有利な時期です。大いなる吉で問題ありません。下が厚くないのは自分のためではありません。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：或益之，十朋之龜弗克違，永貞吉。王用享于帝，吉。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows parties adding to the stores of its subject ten pairs of tortoise shells whose oracles cannot be opposed. Let him persevere in being firm and correct, and there will be good fortune. Let the king, (having the virtues thus distinguished), employ them in presenting his offerings to God, and there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'Parties add to his stores:' - they come from beyond (his immediate circle) to do so.
xiang.modern_ja: 増があるのは、外から来るからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.modern_ja: 亀の甲羅で占っても止められないほどの増益があります。永く堅実であれば吉です。王が帝に祭祀を行うと吉です。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：益之用凶事，无咎。有孚中行，告公用圭。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows increase given to its subject by means of what is evil, so that he shall (be led to good), and be without blame. Let him be sincere and pursue the path of the Mean, (so shall he secure the recognition of the ruler, like) an officer who announces himself to his prince by the symbol of his rank.

xiang.modern: 'Increase is given by means of what is evil and difficult:' - as he has in himself (the qualities called forth).
xiang.modern_ja: 凶事によって増やすのは、すでにあることに加えるからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.modern_ja: 凶事によって増やすと問題なく、中道で進み、公に告げて信頼を得ます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：中行，告公從。利用為依遷國。
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject pursuing the due course. His advice to his prince is followed. He can with advantage be relied on in such a movement as that of removing the capital.

xiang.modern: 'His advice to his prince is followed:' - his (only) object in it being the increase (of the general good).
xiang.modern_ja: 公に告げて従うのは、益志を持つためです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

4.modern_ja: 中道で公に告げて従えば、国を移すことを頼むのに有利です。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：有孚惠心，勿問元吉。有孚惠我德。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject with sincere heart seeking to benefit (all below). There need be no question about it; the result will be great good fortune. (All below) will with sincere heart acknowledge his goodness.

xiang.classic: 有孚惠心，勿問之矣。惠我德，大得志也。
xiang.modern: '(The ruler) with sincere heart seeks to benefit (all below):' - there need be no question (about the result). '(All below) with sincere heart acknowledge (his goodness):' - he gets what he desires on a great scale.
xiang.modern_ja: 人々が我が徳を恵むと、大きく志を得ます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

5.modern_ja: 恩恵を与える心があり、問わずとも大いなる吉です。人々が我が徳を恵んでくれます。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：莫益之，或擊之，立心勿恆，凶。
6.modern: In the sixth NINE, undivided, we see one to whose increase none will contribute, while many will seek to assail him. He observes no regular rule in the ordering of his heart. There will be evil.

xiang.classic: 莫益之，偏辭也。或擊之，自外來也。
xiang.modern: 'To his increase none will contribute:' - this expresses but half the result. 'Many will seek to assail him:' - they will come from beyond (his immediate circle) to do so.
xiang.modern_ja: 増やさずに打つのは偏った言葉です。打たれるのは外から来るからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

6.modern_ja: 増やさずに打つと、恒心がなく凶です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

judgment.classic: 夬：揚于王庭，孚號，有厲，告自邑，不利即戎，利有攸往。
judgment.modern: Guai requires (in him who would fulfil its meaning) the exhibition (of the culprit's guilt) in the royal court, and a sincere and earnest appeal (for sympathy and support), with a consciousness of the peril (involved in cutting off the criminal). He should (also) make announcement in his own city, and show that it will not be well to have recourse at once to arms. (In this way) there will be advantage in whatever he shall go forward to.
judgment.modern_ja: 決断して除く時期です。王庭に示し、誠意を持って危険を告げます。自分の領地から告げ、武力に頼ることは有利ではありません。どこかに行くことが有利です。

tuan.classic: 夬，決也，剛決柔也。健而說，決而和，揚于王庭，柔乘五剛也。孚號有厲，其危乃光也。告自邑，不利即戎，所尚乃窮也。利有攸往，剛長乃終也。
tuan.modern: Guai is the symbol of displacing or removing. We see (in the figure) the strong (lines) displacing the weak. (We have in it the attributes of) strength and complacency. There is displacement, but harmony (continues). 'The exhibition (of the criminal's guilt) in the royal courtyard' is suggested by the (one) weak (line) mounted on the five strong lines. There 'is an earnest and sincere appeal (for sympathy and support), and a consciousness of the peril (involved in the undertaking):' - it is the realisation of this danger, which makes the method (of compassing the object) brilliant. 'He should make an announcement in his own city, and show that it will not be well to have recourse at once to arms:' - (if he have recourse to arms), what he prefers will (soon) be exhausted. 'There will be advantage in whatever he shall go forward to:' - when the growth of the strong (lines) has been completed, there will be an end (of the displacement).
tuan.modern_ja: 決断して弱いものを断ち切る時期です。王庭に示し、誠意を持って危険を告げ、武力よりも知恵で対処することが大切です。

xiang.classic: 澤上于天，夬；君子以施祿及下，居德則忌。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) heaven and that for the waters of a marsh mounting above it form Guai. The superior man, in accordance with this, bestows emolument on those below him, and dislikes allowing his gifts to accumulate (undispensed).
xiang.modern_ja: 天上に沢がある形です。恩恵を下に施し、徳に居って咎められないようにすることが大切です。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：壯于前趾，往不勝為咎。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject in (the pride of) strength advancing with his toes. He goes forward, but will not succeed. There will be ground for blame.

xiang.modern: 'Without (being able to) succeed, he goes forward:' - this is an error.
xiang.modern_ja: 勝てないなら進むのは過ちです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

1.modern_ja: つま先に力を入れて前進しても、勝てないなら問題があります。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：惕號，莫夜有戎，勿恤。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject full of apprehension and appealing (for sympathy and help). Late at night hostile measures may be (taken against him), but he need not be anxious about them.

xiang.modern: 'Though hostile measures be taken against him, he need not be anxious:' - he pursues the course of the due mean.
xiang.modern_ja: 武器を持っても恐れないのは、中道を得ているからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

2.modern_ja: 警戒の叫びを上げれば、夜に武器を持っても恐れることはありません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：壯于頄，有凶。君子夬夬，獨行，遇雨，若濡，有慍，无咎。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject (about to advance) with strong (and determined) looks. There will be evil. (But) the superior man, bent on cutting off (the criminal), will walk alone and encounter the rain, (till he be hated by his proper associates) as if he were contaminated (by the others). (In the end) there will be no blame against him.

xiang.modern: 'The superior man looks bent on cutting off the culprit:' - there will in the end be no error.
xiang.modern_ja: 決断力のある人が進めば、最終的に問題はありません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

3.modern_ja: 頬骨に力があると凶です。決断力のある人が一人で雨に濡れて不快になっても、問題はありません。

4.label: 九四
4.classic: 九四：臀无膚，其行次且。牽羊悔亡，聞言不信。
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows one from whose buttocks the skin has been stripped, and who walks slowly and with difficulty. (If he could act) like. a sheep led (after its companions), occasion for repentance would disappear. But though he hear these words, he will not believe them.

xiang.classic: 其行次且，位不當也。聞言不信，聰不明也。
xiang.modern: 'He walks slowly and with difficulty:' - he is not in the place appropriate to him. 'He hears these words, but does not believe them:' - he hears, but does not understand.
xiang.modern_ja: 歩みが難しいのは、位置が正しくないからです。言葉を聞いても信じないのは、聡明さが足りないからです。

4.modern_ja: 尻に皮がなく、歩みが難しい時期です。羊を率いれば後悔が消えます。言葉を聞いても信じません。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：莧陸夬夬，中行无咎。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows (the small men like) a bed of purslain, which ought to be uprooted with the utmost determination. (The subject of the line having such determination), his action, in harmony with his central position, will lead to no error or blame.

xiang.modern: 'If his action be in harmony with his central position, there will be no error:' - but his standing in the due mean is not yet clearly displayed.
xiang.modern_ja: 中道で進めば、中にあってまだ輝いていないです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

5.modern_ja: 雑草を決断するように、中道で進めば問題ありません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：无號，終有凶。
6.modern: The sixth SIX, divided, shows its subject without any (helpers) on whom to call. His end will be evil.

xiang.modern: 'There is the misery of having none on whom to call:' - the end will be that he cannot continue any longer.
xiang.modern_ja: 叫びがない凶は、最終的に続けられません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

6.modern_ja: 叫びがなければ、最終的に凶があります。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

judgment.classic: 姤：女壯，勿用取女。
judgment.modern: Gou shows a female who is bold and strong. It will not be good to marry (such) a female.
judgment.modern_ja: 偶然の出会いがある時期です。女性が強すぎて、嫁がせるのに適していません。今の流れを活かして、前に進んでいくことができます。

tuan.classic: 姤，遇也，柔遇剛也。勿用取女，不可與長也。天地相遇，品物咸章也。剛遇中正，天下大行也。姤之時義大矣哉！
tuan.modern: Gou has the significance of unexpectedly coming on. (We see in it) the weak (line) coming unexpectedly on the strong ones. 'It will not be good to marry (such) a female:' - one (so symbolised) should not be long associated with. Heaven and earth meeting together (as here represented), all the variety of natural things become fully displayed. When a strong (line) finds itself in the central and correct position, (good government) will greatly prevail all under the sky. Great indeed is the significance of what has to be done at the time indicated by Gou!
tuan.modern_ja: 遇とは出会うことで、弱いものが強いものに出会います。嫁がせるのに適していないのは、長く続けられないからです。天地が出会えば万物が現れ、強いものが中正に出会えば天下が大いに行われます。遇う時の意義は大きいです。

xiang.classic: 天下有風，姤；后以施命誥四方。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) wind and that for the sky above it form Gou. The sovereign, in accordance with this, delivers his charges, and promulgates his announcements throughout the four quarters (of the kingdom).
xiang.modern_ja: 天の下に風がある形です。命を発して四方に告げることが大切です。この時期の意味を理解することで、より良い選択ができます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：繫于金柅，貞吉，有攸往，見凶，羸豕孚蹢躅。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows how its subject should be kept (like a carriage) tied and fastened to a metal drag, in which case with firm correctness there will be good fortune. (But) if he move in any direction, evil will appear. He will be (like) a lean pig, which is sure to keep jumping about.

xiang.modern: 'Tied and fastened to a metal drag:' - (this describes the arrest of) the weak (line) in its advancing course.
xiang.modern_ja: 金の止め具で止めるのは、柔らかいものを止める道です。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

1.modern_ja: 金の止め具で止める時期です。堅実で吉。どこかに行けば凶を見ます。やせた豚がよじ登っているようです。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：包有魚，无咎，不利賓。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject with a wallet of fish. There will be no error. But it will not be well to let (the subject of the first line) go forward to the guests.

xiang.modern: 'He has a wallet of fish:' - it is right for him not to allow (the subject of the first line) to get to the guests.
xiang.modern_ja: 袋の中に魚がいるのは、客に及ばせない義です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 袋の中に魚がいて問題なく、客には適しません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：臀无膚，其行次且，厲，无大咎。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows one from whose buttocks the skin has been stripped so that he walks with difficulty. The position is perilous, but there will be no great error.

xiang.modern: 'He walks with difficulty:' - but his steps have not yet been drawn (into the course of the first line).
xiang.modern_ja: 歩みが難しいのは、行く道がまだ引かれていないからです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

3.modern_ja: 尻に皮がなく、歩みが難しい時期です。大きな問題は避けられます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject with his wallet, but no fish in it. This will give rise to evil.

xiang.modern: 'The evil' indicated by there being 'no fish in the wallet' is owing to (the subject of the line) keeping himself aloof from the people.
xiang.modern_ja: 魚がなく凶なのは、民を遠ざけているからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

4.modern_ja: 袋に魚がなく、凶が起こります。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：以杞包瓜，含章，有隕自天。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, (shows its subject as) a medlar tree overspreading the gourd (beneath it). If he keep his brilliant qualities concealed, (a good issue) will descend (as) from Heaven.

xiang.classic: 九五含章，中正也。有隕自天，志不舍命也。
xiang.modern: 'The subject of the fifth NINE, (undivided), keeps his brilliant qualities concealed:' - as is indicated by his central and correct position. '(The good issue) descends (as) from Heaven: - 'his aim does not neglect the ordinances (of Heaven).
xiang.modern_ja: 中正で含んでいるのは、志が自分を捨てていないからです。天から降るものがあるのは、命に逆らわないからです。

5.modern_ja: 瓜を杞で包むように、美しさを含んでいます。天から降るものがあります。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：姤其角，吝，无咎。
6.modern: The sixth NINE, undivided, shows its subject receiving others on his horns. There will be occasion for regret, but there will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He receives others on his horns:' - he is exhausted at his greatest height, and there will be cause for regret.
xiang.modern_ja: 角を使って遇うのは、上にあって窮するからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

6.modern_ja: 角を使って遇うと恥をかきますが、問題はありません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

judgment.classic: 萃：亨。王假有廟，利見大人，亨，利貞。用大牲吉，利有攸往。
judgment.modern: In (the state denoted by) Cui, the king will repair to his ancestral temple. It will be advantageous (also) to meet with the great man; and then there will be progress and success, though the advantage must come through firm correctness. The use of great victims will conduce to good fortune; and in whatever direction movement is made, it will be advantageous.
judgment.modern_ja: 集まる時期です。通じて、王が祖廟に至ります。偉大な人に会うことが有利で、堅実なら吉です。大きな犠牲が吉で、どこに行っても有利です。

tuan.classic: 萃，聚也；順以說，剛中而應，故聚也。王假有廟，致孝享也。利見大人亨，聚以正也。用大牲吉，利有攸往，順天命也。觀其所聚，而天地萬物之情可見矣。
tuan.modern: Cui indicates (the condition of union, or) being collected. We have in it (the symbol of) docile obedience going on to (what is expressed by that of) satisfaction. There is the strong line in the central place, and rightly responded to. Hence comes the (idea of) union. 'The king will repair to his ancestral temple:' - with the utmost filial piety he presents his offerings (to the spirits of his ancestors). 'It will be advantageous to meet the great man, and there will then be prosperity and success:' - the union effected by him will be on and through what is correct. 'The, use of great victims will conduce to good fortune; and in whatsoever direction movement is made, it will be advantageous:' - all is done in accordance with the ordinances of Heaven. When we look at the way in which the gatherings (here shown) take place, the natural tendencies (in the outward action) of heaven and earth and of all things can be seen..
tuan.modern_ja: 集まって通じる時期です。王が祖廟に至って先祖を祀り、正道によって集まることで、天命に順い万物の情が見えます。

xiang.classic: 澤上於地，萃；君子以除戎器，戒不虞。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing the) earth and that for the waters of a marsh raised above it form Cui. The superior man, in accordance with this, has his weapons of war put in good repair, to be prepared against unforeseen contingencies.
xiang.modern_ja: 沢の上に地がある形です。武器を準備して不慮の事態に備えることが大切です。状況を見極めながら、着実に歩んでいくことが大切です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：有孚不終，乃亂乃萃，若號一握為笑，勿恤，往无咎。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject with a sincere desire (for union), but unable to carry it out, so that disorder is brought into the sphere of his union. If he cry out (for help to his proper correlate), all at once (his tears) will give place to smiles. He need not mind (the temporary difficulty); as he goes forward, there will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'In consequence disorder is brought into the sphere of his union:' - his mind and aim are thrown into confusion.
xiang.modern_ja: 乱れて集まるのは、志が乱れているからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 誠意があっても終わらなければ、乱れて集まります。呼べば一握りで笑いになり、恐れることはありません。進めば問題ありません。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：引吉，无咎，孚乃利用禴。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject led forward (by his correlate). There will be good fortune, and freedom from error. There is entire sincerity, and in that case (even the small offerings of) the vernal sacrifice are acceptable.

xiang.modern: 'He is led forward; there will be good fortune, and freedom from error:' - (the virtue proper to) his central place has not undergone any change.
xiang.modern_ja: 引かれて吉で問題ないのは、中にあって変わらないからです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.modern_ja: 引かれて吉で問題ありません。誠意があれば、簡素な祭祀でも有利です。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：萃如，嗟如，无攸利，往无咎，小吝。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject striving after union and seeming to sigh, yet nowhere finding any advantage. If he go forward, he will not err, though there may be some small cause for regret.

xiang.modern: 'If he go forward, he will not err:' - in the subject of the topmost line there is humility and condescension.
xiang.modern_ja: 進めば問題ないのは、上が従順だからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.modern_ja: 集まっても嘆く時期です。利がなく、進めば問題なく、小さな恥をかきます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject in such a state that, if he be greatly fortunate, he will receive no blame.

xiang.modern: 'If he be grandly fortunate, he will receive no blame:' - (this condition is necessary, because) his position is not the one proper to him.
xiang.modern_ja: 大吉で問題ないのは、位置が正しくないからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

4.modern_ja: 大いなる吉で問題ありません。位置が正しくないからです。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：萃有位，无咎。匪孚，元永貞，悔亡。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the union (of all) under its subject in the place of dignity. There will be no error. If any do not have confidence in him, let him see to it that (his virtue) be great, long-continued, and firmly correct, and all occasion for repentance will disappear.

xiang.modern: 'There is the union (of all) under him in the place of dignity:' - (but) his mind and aim have not yet been brilliantly displayed.
xiang.modern_ja: 位置があって集まり、志がまだ輝いていません。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.modern_ja: 位置があって集まり、問題はありません。信じなくても、元から永く堅実であれば、後悔が消えます。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：齎咨涕洟，无咎。
6.modern: The topmost SIX, divided, shows its subject sighing and weeping; but there will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He sighs and weeps:' - he does not yet rest in his topmost position.
xiang.modern_ja: 上にあってまだ安らいでいません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

6.modern_ja: 悲嘆し涙を流しますが、問題はありません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

judgment.classic: 升：元亨，用見大人，勿恤，南征吉。
judgment.modern: Sheng indicates that (under its conditions) there will be great progress and success. Seeking by (the qualities implied in it) to meet with the great man, its subject need have no anxiety. Advance to the south will be fortunate.
judgment.modern_ja: 上に昇る時期です。大いに通じ、偉大な人に会うことが有利です。恐れることなく、南に征けば吉です。

tuan.classic: 柔以時升，巽而順，剛中而應，是以大亨。用見大人，勿恤；有慶也。南征吉，志行也。
tuan.modern: (We find) the weak (line), as it finds the opportunity, ascending upwards. We have (the attribute) of flexibility and that of obedience; we have the strong line (below) and its proper correlate above: - these things indicate that there will be 'great progress and success.' 'Seeking (by the qualities implied in Sheng) to meet with the great man, its subject need have no anxiety:' - there will be ground for congratulation. 'Advance to the south will be fortunate:' - his aim will be carried out.
tuan.modern_ja: 柔らかいものが時と共に上に昇ります。従順にして途中から、強いものを得て応じます。大いに通じ、偉大な人に会うことが有利で、祝福があります。南に征けば吉で、志が行われます。

xiang.classic: 地中生木，升；君子以順德，積小以高大。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) wood and that for the earth with the wood growing in the midst of it form Sheng. The superior man, in accordance with this, pays careful attention to his virtue, and accumulates the small developments of it till it is high and great.
xiang.modern_ja: 地中に木がある形です。徳を積み重ね、小さいものを積んで高く大きくすることが大切です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：允升，大吉。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject advancing upwards with the welcome (of those above him). There will be great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'He is welcomed in his advance upwards, and there will be great good fortune:' - (the subjects of) the upper (trigram) are of the same mind with him.
xiang.modern_ja: 誠実に昇ると大吉なのは、上と志が合うからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 誠実に昇ると大吉です。上と志が合っています。この時期を大切にすることで、良い流れが生まれます。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：孚乃利用禴，无咎。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject with that sincerity which will make even the (small) offerings of the vernal sacrifice acceptable. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'The sincerity of the subject of the second NINE, undivided,' affords occasion for joy.
xiang.modern_ja: 中にあって誠意があるからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

2.modern_ja: 誠意があれば、簡素な祭祀でも問題ありません。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：升虛邑。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject ascending upwards (as into) an empty city.

xiang.modern: 'He advances upwards (as into) an empty city:' - he has no doubt or hesitation.
xiang.modern_ja: 空っぽの都市に昇るのは、疑うことがないからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

3.modern_ja: 空っぽの都市に昇るように、障害がない時期です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

4.label: 六四
4.classic: 六四：王用亨于岐山，吉无咎。
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject employed by the king to present his offerings on mount Kh?. There will be good fortune; there will be no mistake.

xiang.modern: 'The king employs him to prevent his offerings on mount Kh?:' - such a service (of spiritual Beings) is according to (their mind).
xiang.modern_ja: 王が岐山に祭祀を行うのは順事です。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.modern_ja: 王が岐山に祭祀を行うと吉で問題ありません。順にして事を行っています。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：貞吉，升階。
5.modern: The fifth six, divided, shows its subject firmly correct, and therefore enjoying good fortune. He ascends the stairs (with all due ceremony).

xiang.modern: 'He is firmly correct, and will therefore enjoy good fortune. He ascends the stairs (with all due ceremony):' - he grandly succeeds in his aim.
xiang.modern_ja: 堅実で吉、階段を昇るのは大きく志を得るからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

5.modern_ja: 堅実で吉、階段を昇ります。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：冥升，利于不息之貞。
6.modern: The sixth six, divided, shows its subject advancing upwards blindly. Advantage will be found in a ceaseless maintenance of firm correctness.

xiang.modern: 'He blindly advances upwards,' and is in the highest place: - but there is decay in store for him, and he will not (preserve) his riches.
xiang.modern_ja: 暗闘の中で上に昇るのは、消えていくからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

6.modern_ja: 暗闘の中で昇り、止まらずに堅実であることが有利です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

judgment.classic: 困：亨，貞，大人吉，无咎，有言不信。
judgment.modern: In (the condition denoted by) Kun there may (yet be) progress and success. For the firm and correct, the (really) great man, there will be good fortune. He will fall into no error. If he make speeches, his words cannot be made good.
judgment.modern_ja: 困窮の時期です。通じ、偉大な人は堅実で吉です。言葉で訴えても信じられません。状況を見極めながら、着実に歩んでいくことが大切です。

tuan.classic: 困，剛掩也。險以說，困而不失其所，亨；其唯君子乎？貞大人吉，以剛中也。有言不信，尚口乃窮也。
tuan.modern: In Kun (we see) the strong (lines) covered and obscured (by the weak). We have in it (the attribute of) perilousness going on to that of satisfaction. Who is it but the superior man that, though straitened, still does not fail in making progress to his proper end? 'For the firm and correct, the (really) great man, there will be good fortune:' - this is shown by the central positions of the strong (lines). 'If he make speeches, his words cannot be made good:' - to be fond of arguing or pleading is the way to be reduced to extremity.
tuan.modern_ja: 困窮とは、強いものが覆われることです。険しくても喜びがあり、困窮しても通じるのは、偉大な人が中正だからです。偉大な人は堅実で吉なのは、強さが中にあるからです。言葉で訴えても信じられないのは、口先だけでは信用されないからです。

xiang.classic: 澤无水，困；君子以致命遂志。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) a marsh, and (below it that for a defile, which has drained the other dry so that there is) no water in it, form Kun. The superior man, in accordance with this, will sacrifice his life in order to carry out his purpose.
xiang.modern_ja: 沢に水がない形です。命を捧げて志を達成することを考えることが大切です。状況を見極めながら、着実に歩んでいくことが大切です。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：臀困于株木，入于幽谷，三歲不覿。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject with bare buttocks straitened under the stump of a tree. He enters a dark valley, and for three years has no prospect (of deliverance).

xiang.modern: 'He enters a dark valley:' - so benighted is he, and without clear vision.
xiang.modern_ja: 暗い谷に入るのは、暗くて明るくないからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

1.modern_ja: 尻を木の株で困らせ、暗い谷に入って三年出られません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：困于酒食，朱紱方來，利用享祀，征凶，无咎。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows its subject straitened amidst his wine and viands. There come to him anon the red knee-covers (of the ruler). It will be well for him (to maintain his sincerity as) in sacrificing. Active operations (on his part) will lead to evil, but he will be free from blame.

xiang.modern: 'He is straitened amidst his wine and viands:' - (but) his position is central, and there will be ground for congratulation.
xiang.modern_ja: 酒食に困っているのは、中にあって祝福があるからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

2.modern_ja: 酒食に困っていると、朱い帯をつけた者が来ます。祭祀を行うのに有利で、進めば凶ですが問題はありません。

3.label: 六三
3.classic: 六三：困于石，據于蒺蔾，入于其宮，不見其妻，凶。
3.modern: The third SIX, divided, shows its subject straitened before a (frowning) rock. He lays hold of thorns. He enters his palace, and does not see his wife. There will be evil.

xiang.classic: 據于蒺蔾，乘剛也。入于其宮，不見其妻，不祥也。
xiang.modern: 'He lays hold of thorns:' - (this is suggested by the position of the line) above the strong (line). 'He enters his palace, and does not see his wife:' - this is inauspicious.
xiang.modern_ja: 棘に寄りかかるのは、強いものに乗っているからです。家に入っても妻が見えないのは、不吉だからです。

3.modern_ja: 石に困り、棘に寄りかかります。家に入っても妻が見えません。凶です。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

4.label: 九四
4.classic: 九四：來徐徐，困于金車，吝，有終。
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided shows its subject proceeding very slowly (to help the subject of the first line), who is straitened by the carriage adorned with metal in front of him. There will be occasion for regret, but the end will be good.

xiang.classic: 來徐徐，志在下也。雖不當位，有與也。
xiang.modern: 'He proceeds very slowly (to help the subject of the first line):' - his aim is directed to (help) that lower (line). Although he is not in his appropriate place, he and that other will (in the end) be together.
xiang.modern_ja: ゆっくり来るのは、志が下にあるからです。位置が正しくなくても終わりがあります。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

4.modern_ja: ゆっくり来て、金の車に困ります。恥をかきますが終わりがあります。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：劓刖，困于赤紱，乃徐有說，利用祭祀。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows its subject with his nose and feet cut off. He is straitened by (his ministers in their) scarlet aprons. He is leisurely in his movements, however, and is satisfied. It will be well for him to be (as sincere) as in sacrificing (to spiritual beings).

xiang.classic: 劓刖，志未得也。乃徐有說，以中直也。利用祭祀，受福也。
xiang.modern: 'His nose and feet are cut off:' - his aim has not yet been gained. 'He is leisurely, however, in his movements, and is satisfied:' - his position is central and (his virtue) is correct. 'It will be well for him to be (as sincere as) in sacrificing:' -  so shall he receive blessing.
xiang.modern_ja: 鼻や足を切られるのは、志がまだ得られないからです。ゆっくりと喜びがあるのは、中正だからです。祭祀が有利なのは、祝福を受けるからです。

5.modern_ja: 鼻や足を切られても、朱い帯をつけた者に困らされます。ゆっくりと喜びがあり、祭祀を行うことが有利です。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：困于葛藟，于臲卼，曰動悔。有悔，征吉。
6.modern: The sixth SIX, divided, shows its subject straitened, as if bound with creepers; or n a high and dangerous position, and saying (to himself), 'If I move, I shall repent it.' If he do repent of former errors, there will be good fortune in his going forward.

xiang.classic: 困于葛藟，未當也。動悔，有悔吉，行也。
xiang.modern: 'He is straitened as if bound with creepers: (his spirit and action) are unsuitable. '(He says), "If I move, I shall repent of it." And he does repent (of former errors), which leads to good fortune:' - so he (now) goes on.
xiang.modern_ja: つる草に困るのは、まだ正しくないからです。動けば後悔がありますが、進めば吉です。

6.modern_ja: つる草に困り、動けば危うい状態です。後悔があると言えば後悔がないので、進めば吉です。

judgment.classic: 井：改邑不改井，无喪无得，往來井井。汔至，亦未繘井，羸其瓶，凶。
judgment.modern: (Looking at) Jing, (we think of) how (the site of) a town may be changed, while (the fashion of) its wells undergoes no change. (The water of a well) never disappears and never receives (any great) increase, and those who come and those who go can draw and enjoy the benefit. If (the drawing) have nearly been accomplished, but, before the rope has quite reached the water, the bucket is broken, this is evil.
judgment.modern_ja: 井戸のような時期です。町を変えても井戸は変わりません。失うことも増えることもなく、来る者も去る者も井戸から汲みます。ほとんど水を汲み上げたところで綱を失うと凶です。

tuan.classic: 巽乎水而上水，井；井養而不窮也。改邑不改井，乃以剛中也。汔至亦未繘井，未有功也。羸其瓶，是以凶也。
tuan.modern: (We have the symbol of) wood in the water and the raising of the water; which (gives us the idea of) a well. A well supplies nourishment and is not (itself) exhausted. 'The site of a town may be changed, while the fashion of its wells undergoes no change:' - this is indicated by the central position of the strong lines (in the second and fifth places). 'The drawing is nearly accomplished, but the rope has not yet reached the water of the well:' - its service has not yet been accomplished. 'The bucket is broken:' - it is this that occasions evil.
tuan.modern_ja: 木を水の上に下ろして汲み上げるのが井戸です。井戸は養って窮まりません。町を変えても井戸は変わらないのは、強さが中にあるからです。ほとんど汲んだところで綱を失う凶は、功が成っていないからです。

xiang.classic: 木上有水，井；君子以勞民勸相。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) wood and above it that for water form Jing. The superior man, in accordance with this, comforts the people, and. stimulates them to mutual helpfulness.
xiang.modern_ja: 木の上に水がある形です。民を労い、互いに助け合うことを勧めることが大切です。今の流れを活かして、前に進んでいくことができます。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：井泥不食，舊井无禽。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows a well so muddy that men will not drink of it; or an old well to which neither birds (nor other creatures) resort.

xiang.classic: 井泥不食，下也。舊井无禽，時舍也。
xiang.modern: 'A well so muddy that men will not drink of it:' - this is indicated by the low position (of the line). 'An old well to which the birds do not come:' - it has been forsaken in the course of time.
xiang.modern_ja: 井戸の泥は食べられないのは、下だからです。古い井戸に鳥が来ないのは、時に捨てられているからです。

1.modern_ja: 井戸の泥は食べられません。古い井戸には鳥も来ません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：井谷射鮒，瓮敝漏。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows a well from which by a hole the water escapes and flows away to the shrimps (and such small creatures among the grass), or one the water of which leaks away from a broken basket.

xiang.modern: 'A well from which by a hole the water escapes, and flows away to the shrimps:' - (the subject of this second line has) none co-operating with him (above).
xiang.modern_ja: 井戸の谷で魚を射るのは、応える者がないからです。今の状況を受け入れながら、次の一歩を考えてみると良いです。

2.modern_ja: 井戸の谷で魚を射ます。甕は壊れて漏れています。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：井渫不食，為我心惻，可用汲，王明，並受其福。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows a well, which has been cleared out, but is not used. Our hearts are sorry for this, for the water might be drawn out and used. If the king were (only) intelligent, both he and we might receive the benefit of it.

xiang.classic: 井渫不食，行惻也。求王明，受福也。
xiang.modern: 'The well has been cleared out, but is not used:' - (even) passers-by would be sorry for this. A prayer is made 'that the king were intelligent:' - for then blessing would be received.
xiang.modern_ja: 井戸が澄んでも飲まれないのは、上に明王がないからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: 井戸は澄んでも飲まれません。心が痛みます。汲むことができれば、王が明であれば共に福を受けられます。

4.label: 六四
4.modern: The fourth SIX, divided, shows a well, the lining of which is well laid. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'A well the lining of which is well laid. There will be no error:' - the well has been put in good repair.
xiang.modern_ja: 井戸を石で覆って問題ないのは、井戸を修繕するからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

4.modern_ja: 井戸を石で覆って問題ありません。修繕の時期です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：井冽，寒泉食。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows a clear, limpid well, (the waters from) whose cold spring are (freely) drunk.

xiang.modern: 'The waters from the cold spring are (freely) drunk:' - this is indicated by the central and correct position (of the line).
xiang.modern_ja: 冷たい泉を飲むのは、中正だからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.modern_ja: 井戸は冽として、冷たい泉を飲みます。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進むことで道が開けます。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：井收勿幕，有孚元吉。
6.modern: The topmost SIX, divided, shows (the water from) the well brought to the top, which is not allowed to be covered. This suggests the idea of sincerity. There will be great good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The great good fortune' at the topmost place indicates the grand accomplishment (of the idea in the hexagram).
xiang.modern_ja: 大いなる吉が上にあるのは、大いに功を成すからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

6.modern_ja: 井戸から汲んで覆わず、誠意があって大いなる吉です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

judgment.classic: 革：巳日乃孚，元亨利貞，悔亡。
judgment.modern: (What takes place as indicated by) Ge is believed in only after it has been accomplished. There will be great progress and success. Advantage will come from being firm and correct. (In that case) occasion for repentance will disappear.
judgment.modern_ja: 変革の時期です。実行してから信じられます。大いに通じ、堅実であれば有利で、後悔が消えます。

tuan.classic: 革，水火相息，二女同居，其志不相得，曰革。巳日乃孚；革而信也。文明以說，大亨以正，革而當，其悔乃亡。天地革而四時成，湯武革命，順乎天而應乎人，革之時大矣哉！
tuan.modern: In Ge (we see) water and fire extinguishing each other; (we see also) two daughters dwelling together, but with their minds directed to different objects: - (on account of these things) it is called (the hexagram of) Change. 'It is believed in (only) after it has been accomplished:' - when the change has been made, faith is accorded to it. (We have) cultivated intelligence (as the basis of) pleased satisfaction, (suggesting) 'great progress and success,' coming from what is correct. When change thus takes place in the proper way, 'occasion for repentance disappears.' Heaven and earth undergo their changes, and the four seasons complete their functions. Thang changed the appointment (of the line of Hsi? to the throne), and Wu (that of the line of Shang), in accordance with (the will of) Heaven, and in response to (the wishes of) men. Great indeed is what takes place in a time of change.
tuan.modern_ja: 水と火が互いに作用し、変革が起こる時期です。天地が変革して四季が成り、正しい変革なら後悔が消えます。

xiang.classic: 澤中有火，革；君子以治歷明時。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing the waters of) a marsh and that for fire in the midst of them form Ge. The superior man, in accordance with this, regulates his (astronomical) calculations, and makes clear the seasons and times.
xiang.modern_ja: 沢の中に火がある形です。暦を定めて時を明らかにすることが大切です。この時期を活かすことで、成長につながります。

1.label: 初九
1.classic: 初九：鞏用黃牛之革。
1.modern: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject (as if he were) bound with the skin of a yellow ox.

xiang.classic: 鞏用黃牛，不可以有為也。
xiang.modern: 'He is bound with (the skin of) a yellow ox:' - he should in his circumstances be taking action.
xiang.modern_ja: 黄牛で縛られているのは、まだ動く時期ではないことを示しています。今は待つことが賢明です。

1.modern_ja: 黄牛の皮で縛られています。動くことができません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

2.label: 六二
2.classic: 六二：巳日乃革之，征吉，无咎。
2.modern: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject making his changes after some time has passed. Action taken will be fortunate. There will be no error.

xiang.modern: 'He makes his changes when some time has passed:' - what he does will be matter of admiration.
xiang.modern_ja: 実行して変革するのは、進んで称賛があるからです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.modern_ja: 実行して変革すれば吉で問題ありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：征凶，貞厲，革言三就，有孚。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows that action taken by its subject will be evil. Though he be firm and correct, his position is perilous. If the change (he contemplates) have been three times fully discussed, he will be believed in.

xiang.modern: 'The change (contemplated) has been three times fully discussed:' - to what else should attention (now) be directed?
xiang.modern_ja: 変革の言葉が三度周るのは、また何を待つのでしょうか。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

3.modern_ja: 進めば凶で堅実であっても危険です。変革の言葉が三度周れば信じられます。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

4.label: 九四
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows occasion for repentance disappearing (from its subject). Let him be believed in; and though he change (existing) ordinances, there will be good fortune.

xiang.modern: 'The good fortune consequent on changing (existing) ordinances' is due to the faith reposed in his aims.
xiang.modern_ja: 命を変えて吉なのは、志を信じるからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

4.modern_ja: 後悔が消え、信じられて命を変えると吉です。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

5.label: 九五
5.classic: 九五：大人虎變，未占有孚。
5.modern: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the great man (producing his changes) as the tiger (does when he) changes (his stripes). Before he divines (and proceeds to action), faith has been reposed in him.

xiang.modern: 'The great man produces his changes as the tiger does when he changes his stripes:' - their beauty becomes more brilliant.
xiang.modern_ja: 偉大な人が虎のように変わるのは、その文様が煥然としているからです。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.modern_ja: 偉大な人が虎のように変わり、占わなくても信じられます。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応すると良いです。

6.label: 上六
6.classic: 上六：君子豹變，小人革面，征凶，居貞吉。
6.modern: The sixth SIX, divided, shows the superior man producing his changes as the leopard (does when he) changes (his spots), while small men change their faces (and show their obedience). To go forward (now) would lead to evil, but there will be good fortune in abiding firm and correct.

xiang.classic: 君子豹變，其文蔚也。小人革面，順以從君也。
xiang.modern: 'The superior man produces his changes as the leopard does when he changes his spots:' - their beauty becomes more elegant. 'Small men change their faces:' - they show themselves prepared to follow their ruler.
xiang.modern_ja: 賢い人が豹のように変わるのは、その文様が煥然としているからです。小人が顔を変えるのは、君に従うからです。

6.modern_ja: 賢い人が豹のように変わり、小人は顔つきを変えます。進めば凶、堅実に留まれば吉です。

judgment.classic: 鼎：元吉，亨。
judgment.modern: Ding gives the intimation of great progress and success.
judgment.modern_ja: 鼎のような時期です。大いなる吉で、通じます。賢者と共に事を成すことが大切です。今の流れを活かして、前に進んでいくことができます。

tuan.classic: 鼎，象也。以木巽火，亨飪也。聖人亨以享上帝，而大亨以養聖賢。巽而耳目聰明，柔進而上行，得中而應乎剛，是以元亨。
tuan.modern: In Ding we have (symbolically) the figure of a caldron. (We see) the (symbol of) wood entering into that of fire, which suggests the idea of cooking. The sages cooked their offerings in order to present them to God, and made great feasts to nourish their wise and able (ministers). We have the symbol of) flexible obedience, and that (which denotes) ears quick of hearing and eyes clear-sighted. (We have also) the weak (line) advanced and acting above, in the central place, and responded to by the strong (line below). All these things give the idea of 'great progress and success.'
tuan.modern_ja: 鼎は象です。木を火に入れて煮ることで、聖人が煮て上帝に祭り、大いに煮て聖人と賢者を養います。従順に耳と目を持ち、柔らかいものが進み上って強いものに応じます。中を得て強いものに応じ、大いに通じます。

xiang.classic: 木上有火，鼎；君子以正位凝命。
xiang.modern: (The trigram representing) wood and above it that for fire form Ding. The superior man, in accordance with this, keeps his every position correct, and maintains secure the appointment (of Heaven).
xiang.modern_ja: 木の上に火がある形です。正しい位置を保って命を固めることが大切です。この時期を活かすことで、成長につながります。

1.label: 初六
1.classic: 初六：鼎顛趾，利出否，得妾以其子，无咎。
1.modern: The first SIX, divided, shows the caldron overthrown and its feet turned up. (But) there will be advantage in its getting rid of what was bad in it. (Or it shows us) the concubine (whose position is improved) by means of her son. There will be no error.

xiang.classic: 鼎顛趾，未悖也。利出否，以從貴也。
xiang.modern: 'The caldron is overturned, and its feet turned upwards:' - but this is not (all) contrary (to what is right). 'There will be advantage in getting rid of what was bad:' - thereby (the subject of the line) will follow the more noble (subject of the fourth line).
xiang.modern_ja: 鼎を逆さにするのは、まだ悪くないからです。汚れを出すのに利があるのは、貴いものに従うからです。

1.modern_ja: 鼎の足を逆さにして、汚れを出すのに利があります。妾を得て子のためにしますが問題ありません。

2.label: 九二
2.classic: 九二：鼎有實，我仇有疾，不我能即，吉。
2.modern: The second NINE, undivided, shows the caldron with the things (to be cooked) in it. (If its subject can say), 'My enemy dislikes me, but he cannot approach me,' there will be good fortune.

xiang.classic: 鼎有實，慎所之也。我仇有疾，終无尤也。
xiang.modern: 'There is the caldron with the things (to be cooked) in it:' - let (the subject of the line) be careful where he goes. 'My enemy dislikes me:' - but there will in the end be no fault (to which he can point).
xiang.modern_ja: 鼎に実があるのは、慎んで進むべきです。敵が嫉妬しても、最終的に問題ありません。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

2.modern_ja: 鼎に実があり、敵が嫉妬しても私に及ぶことはありません。吉です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

3.label: 九三
3.classic: 九三：鼎耳革，其行塞，雉膏不食，方雨虧悔，終吉。
3.modern: The third NINE, undivided, shows the caldron with (the places of) its ears changed. The progress (of its subject) is (thus) stopped. The fat flesh of the pheasant (which is in the caldron) will not be eaten. But the (genial) rain will come, and the grounds for repentance will disappear. There will be good fortune in the end.

xiang.modern: 'There is the caldron with (the places for) its ears changed:' - (its subject) has failed in what was required of him (in his situation).
xiang.modern_ja: 鼎の耳が変わるのは、義を失っているからです。自分を信じて、一歩ずつ進んでいくことで道が開けます。

3.modern_ja: 鼎の耳が変わり、行動が塞がれ、キジの汁を食べられません。雨が降って後悔が減り、最終的に吉です。

4.label: 九四
4.classic: 九四：鼎折足，覆公餗，其形渥，凶。
4.modern: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows the caldron with its feet broken; and its contents, designed for the ruler's use, overturned and spilt. Its Subject will be made to blush for shame. There will be evil.

xiang.modern: 'The contents designed for the ruler's use are overturned and spilt:' - how can (the subject of the line) be trusted?
xiang.modern_ja: 公の食事をこぼすのは、信頼がどうなるかです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

4.modern_ja: 鼎の足が折れ、公の食事をこぼして刑罰を受けます。凶です。焦らず、自分のペースで進んでいくことが大切です。

5.label: 六五
5.classic: 六五：鼎黃耳，金鉉，利貞。
5.modern: The fifth six, divided, shows the caldron with yellow ears and rings of metal in them. There will be advantage through being firm and correct.

xiang.modern: 'The caldron has yellow ears:' - the central position (of the line) is taken as (a proof of) the solid (virtue of its subject).
xiang.modern_ja: 鼎に黄金の耳があるのは、中にあって実があるからです。周囲の変化に注意を払いながら、柔軟に対応していくと良いでしょう。

5.modern_ja: 鼎に黄金の耳と玉の飾り、堅実であれば有利です。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

6.label: 上九
6.classic: 上九：鼎玉鉉，大吉，无不利。
6.modern: The sixth NINE, undivided, shows the caldron with rings of jade. There will be great good fortune, and all action taken will be in every way advantageous.

xiang.modern: 'The rings of jade' are at the very top: - the strong and the weak meet in their due proportions.
xiang.modern_ja: 玉の飾りが上にあるのは、強さと柔らかさが調和しているからです。この時期を大切に過ごすことで、良い流れが生まれます。

6.modern_ja: 鼎に玉の飾りがあり、大いなる吉で何も不利なことはありません。今の状況を受け入れながら、次を考えてみると良いです。

judgment.classic: 震：亨。震來虩虩，笑言啞啞。震驚百里，不喪匕鬯。
judgment.modern: Zhen gives the intimation of ease and development.
